TEXT":"Stormbound","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Vinculado a la Tormenta"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Lightning damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño Eléctrico.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When battlehammers were revealed to humans, mortal war became a much more tempestuous affair. The sharpening of swords gave way to the forging of maces, the rumbling thunder of a building storm. Battles became cacophonies of dull clangs as plate mail caved under the pressure of maul strikes and bones cracked sharply, a thundering hurricane littered with strikes of Lightning. Gaavanir is the embodiment of such a storm.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando se revelaron los martillos de guerra a los humanos, la guerra mortal se convirtió en un asunto mucho más tempestuoso. El afilado de las espadas dio paso a la forja de mazas, el estruendo de una tormenta de edificios. Las batallas se convirtieron en cacofonías de aburridos clangs cuando las armaduras se destrozaban bajo la presión de los golpes de martillo y los huesos se rompían bruscamente, en un estruendoso huracán repleto de golpes eléctricos. Gaavanir es la encarnación de tal tormenta."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grievous Wounds","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Heridas Graves"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Immense Pressure","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Presión Inmensa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The Will to Crush","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La Voluntad de Aplastar"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Allows the skill to be charged in order to deal more damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Permite cargar la habilidad para hacer más daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Gaavanir slumbers in the Armory of Creation. Its very existence inspired the concept of battlehammers to craftsmen and blacksmiths around the world. Ever since, battlefields have been littered with broken skulls and crushed rib cages.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Gaavanir descansa en la Armería de la Creación. Su propia existencia inspiró el concepto de martillos de guerra a los artesanos y herreros de todo el mundo. Desde entonces, los campos de batalla han estado llenos de cráneos rotos y cajas torácicas aplastadas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Striking Flintstones","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Pedernales Golpeantes"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Creates a chain of explosions in front of you.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Crea una cadena de explosiones delante del jugador."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_9_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Every battlehammer in Wolcen is a mere shadow of Gaavanir. The destruction they have wrought is nothing compared to what Hephaäron’s hammer would unleash upon mortal existence. In those few moments where Baäpheth tried Gaavanir, the Earth shook and brought on a chain reaction that caused every volcano to spit fire. Since then, it has slept.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cada martillo de guerra en Wolcen es una mera sombra de Gaavanir. La destrucción que han causado no es nada comparada con la que el martillo de Hephaäron desataría sobre la existencia mortal. En esos pocos momentos en que Baäpheth probó Gaavanir, la Tierra tembló y provocó una reacción en cadena que hizo que todos los volcanes escupieran fuego. Desde entonces, ha dormido."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The Axhammer","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El Martillohacha"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases attack speed, reduces damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de ataque, reduce el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Remnants Of Shock","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Restos de Choque"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Spawns a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by this skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Engendra un aliado fantasma que golpea a un enemigo después de ser golpeado por esta habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Radical Shake","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Agitación Radical"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Critical hits inflict Stun on enemies. Effect has a cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los golpes críticos aturden a los enemigos. El efecto tiene tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Crackling Grindstone","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Piedra de Afilar Crepitante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Critical hits have a chance to smite enemies with a bouncing attack based on your weapon damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los Golpes Críticos tienen la probabilidad de golpear a los enemigos con un ataque rebote basado en el daño de tu arma."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BrutalStrike_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Fractal Furia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leave No Witnesses","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sin Dejar Testigos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases number of targets.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el número de objetivos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Flak Handcannon","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cañón Antiaéreo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Each shot of Gunslinger's Brand that hits an enemy deals damage in an area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cada disparo de Marca del Pistolero que golpea a un enemigo inflige daño en la área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_3_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"During his banishment to the Abyss, Ezaneal became more and more obsessed with proving his worth as an inventor. His explosive projectile design was so readily rejected by Hephaäron... What if it could be faster, more direct, more complex, more chaotic? He repeatedly swore to himself that he would overshadow his former master, render his elitist conventions obsolete and fill the world with his chaotic creations; weapons that equalize the playing field, giving anyone the chance to succeed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Durante su destierro al Abismo, Ezaneal se obsesionó cada vez más con demostrar su valía como inventor. Su diseño de proyectil explosivo fue tan fácilmente rechazado por Hephaäron... ¿Y si pudiera ser más rápido, más directo, más complejo, más caótico? Se juró repetidamente que eclipsaría a su antiguo maestro, volvería obsoletas sus convenciones elitistas y llenaría el mundo con sus caóticas creaciones; armas que igualan el campo de juego, dando a cualquiera la oportunidad de triunfar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Time Manipulator","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Manipulador del Tiempo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Aether damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Stasis.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño de Éter.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Inmovilización."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"After much experimentation and a handful of explosive accidents, Ezaneal created the Handheld Iosonic Cannon, the First Pistol. Its pinpoint accuracy, light weight and ability to shift its traversal of aether to high speeds made it extremely deadly. Giving humanity weapons of this nature, so accessible and deadly, would no doubt cause chaos, but Hephaäron had sealed the Armory of Creation permanently. This was the only way to share his invention with humanity; it would take a genius to get inside…","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Después de mucha experimentación y un puñado de accidentes explosivos, Ezaneal creó el Cañón Iosónico de Mano, la Primera Pistola. Su precisión milimétrica, su peso ligero y su capacidad para desplazar su trayectoria de éter a altas velocidades la hacían extremadamente mortal. Dar a la humanidad armas de esta naturaleza, tan accesibles y mortales, sin duda causaría caos, pero Hephaäron había sellado la Armería de la Creación permanentemente. Esta era la única manera de compartir su invento con la humanidad; se necesitaría un genio para entrar..."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ordered Discord","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Discordia Ordenada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hipfire Headshots","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tiro en la Cabeza"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Order Through Chaos","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Orden a Través del Caos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Every shot of Gunslinger's Brand that hits an enemy increases the damage of the next shot incrementally. This buff is reset when a shot misses.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cada disparo de Marca del Pistolero que golpea a un enemigo aumenta el daño del siguiente disparo de forma incremental. Esta mejora se reinicia cuando se falla un disparo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_7_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ezaneal tracked down a Time Seal, a tool used by Anulai-Tai’s Time Devourers to pass through the Aether. Through rigorous experimentation and iteration, Ezaneal built a functional teleportation device. Activating the device tore a small rift in the Aether, allowing Ezaneal to simultaneously be inside the Armory and outside it, which threatened to separate the Fallen from his position in space and time. Despite the existential danger, Ezaneal was able to deposit his weapon into the Armory safely.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ezaneal rastreó un Sello de Tiempo, una herramienta utilizada por los Devoradores de Tiempo de Anulai-Tai para pasar a través del Éter. A través de una rigurosa experimentación e iteración, Ezaneal construyó un dispositivo de teletransportación funcional. Activar el dispositivo rompió una pequeña grieta en el Éter, permitiendo a Ezaneal estar simultáneamente dentro de la Armería y fuera de ella, lo que amenazaba con separar al Caído de su posición en el espacio y el tiempo. A pesar del peligro existencial, Ezaneal pudo depositar su arma en la Armería de forma segura."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Traversal","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Traversal"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shots Pierce the target.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los disparos perforan al objetivo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"No Prisoners","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sin Prisioneros"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Targets with under 10% health are automatically targeted, but damage is reduced.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los objetivos con menos de un 10% de vida son seleccionados automáticamente, pero se reduce el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Scattering Blast","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Explosión de Dispersión"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enemies are automatically targeted in a cone in fornt of you.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos en un cono frente al jugador son seleccionados automáticamente."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Endless Throes","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Agonía Sin Fin"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance and damage for each Ailment stack an enemy has.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de crítico aumentada y daño por cada acumulación de dolencias que tiene un enemigo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Scrutiny","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Escrutinio"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Critical damage increases with aiming time. Resets after maximum aiming time is reached.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El daño crítico aumenta con el tiempo de apuntado. Se reinicia después de alcanzar el tiempo máximo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Backstabber In The Crosshairs","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Puñalada con la Retícula"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enemies that hit you while aiming are automatically targeted.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos que te golpean mientras estás apuntando serán seleccionados automáticamente."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Wild Gunsman","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Pistolero Salvaje"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Fires all shots whenever this skill used.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Dispara todos los tiros siempre que se use esta habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Friendly Fire","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Fuego Amigo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"If an enemy suffers a critical hit, damage is bounced back to the first enemy targeted.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Si un enemigo sufre un daño crítico, el daño rebota en el primer enemigo seleccionado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Augmented Ammunition","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Munición Aumentada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_BullEye_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to a random Element.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en un elemento al azar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Swift Judgment","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Juicio Rápido"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Willpower cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Path of Woe","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Camino de la Aflicción"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Lightning bounces an additional time.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El rayo rebota un vez más."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Storm at Sunset","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tormenta al Atardecer"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Lightning damage to Shadow damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Eléctrico base en daño de Sombra.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Maldición."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"In order to bring transgressors to justice, Beelmalik often has to search shadowy corners of the world, the domain of Moros, the Primordial of Dusk. As Beelmalik sought his redemption, the followers of Moros established a ceasefire with the Fallen Lord in their master’s absence. Criminals that threaten the weakened Cult of Shadows are removed and Beelmalik is free to deliver his righteous punishment. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Para llevar a los transgresores ante la justicia, Beelmalik a menudo tiene que buscar en los rincones más oscuros del mundo, el dominio de Moros, el Primordial del Anochecer. Mientras Beelmalik buscaba su redención, los seguidores de Moros establecieron un alto el fuego con el Señor Caído en ausencia de su amo. Los criminales que amenazan al debilitado Culto de las Sombras son eliminados y Beelmalik es libre de entregar su justo castigo. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Crippling Current","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Corriente Incapacitante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Merciless Conduit","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Conducto Despiadado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Rebuilding the Trinity","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reconstruyendo la Trinidad"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Gives a buff that allows you to deal additional damage based on the base element of this skill. This ability can target allies, and if they are affected by it, the ally will also receive this buff.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un beneficio que te permite infligir daño adicional basado en el elemento base de esta habilidad. Esta habilidad puede apuntar a los aliados, y si se ven afectados por ella, el aliado también recibirá este beneficio."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Beelmalik used to form the same entity with Abanazaar and Etheliel. They were the Primordial of Change, ruling over the Upheaval-Tribunal. Ever since they separated, Beelmalik has been obssessed with chasing and assimilating his brethren to be whole again.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Beelmalik solía formar la misma entidad con Abanazaar y Etheliel. Ellos fueron los Primordiales del Cambio, gobernando sobre el Tribunal de la Agitación. Desde que se separaron, Beelmalik se ha obsesionado con perseguir y asimilar a sus hermanos para que vuelvan a estar completos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Law Manifest in Lightning","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La Ley se Manifiesta con el Rayo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance for lightning to strike from the sky on damaged targets. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de que un rayo caiga del cielo sobre los objetivos dañados. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Presumption Of Guilt","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Presunción de Culpa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Lightning prioritizes enemies that are being damaged over time.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El rayo da prioridad a los enemigos que están sufriendo daño a lo largo del tiempo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Knees Hitting Ground","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rodillas en el Suelo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Critical hits have a chance to inflict Stun on enemies. Adds a cooldown to the skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los golpes críticos tienen una probabilidad de aturdir a los enemigos. Añade un tiempo de recarga a la habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sequestered","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Secuestrado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance against shocked enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico contra enemigos electrocutados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reprisal","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Represalia"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Critical hits cause lightning to fork between other enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los golpes críticos hacen que los rayos se bifurquen entre otros enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_13_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"As twisted and obsessive as Beelmalik can be, he still counts as a \"Conciliator\": a Fallen trying to repair his past deeds against Creation. Should he succeed in redeeming himself, he has the potential to embody Justice rather than Punishment. An absolute, bloody and unforgiving Justice.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Por más retorcido y obsesivo que Beelmalik pueda ser, sigue siendo un \"Conciliador\": un Caído intentando reparar sus actos pasados contra la Creación. Si logra redimirse, tiene el potencial de encarnar la Justicia en lugar del Castigo. Una Justicia absoluta, sangrienta e implacable."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hangman's Lever","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Palanca del Verdugo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Serpentine Scar","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cicatriz Serpentina"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Condensed Arc","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Arco Condensado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_ChainLightning_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sprinting Strides","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Avance de Carrera"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases movement speed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de movimiento."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Break the Line","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Romper la Línea"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Full Frontal Slam","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Envestida Frontal"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inflicts Stun on enemies at the end of the charge. Increases the cooldown of the skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aturde a los enemigos al final de la carga. Aumenta el tiempo de recarga a la habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Forge a Path","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Forjar un Camino"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Charge the skill to channel for longer.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Carga la habilidad para canalizar por más tiempo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Baäpheth commissioned Hephaäron to make something to protect himself, which manifested as Gleidhir, the First Shield. It was forged on a continent melted by Abanazaar’s rage, but it was hardened deep in the ocean by the immense pressure. Gleidhir was created to be an immovable object, to challenge Abanazaar’s unstoppable force.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Baäpheth encargó a Hephaäron que fabricara algo para protegerse, lo que se materializó como Gleidhir, el Primer Escudo. Se forjó en un continente derretido por la furia de Abanazaar, pero se endureció en lo profundo del océano por la inmensa presión. Gleidhir fue creado para ser un objeto inamovible, para desafiar la fuerza imparable de Abanazaar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Everlasting Ember","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Áscua Eterna"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Fire damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño de Fuego.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Armed with Gleidhir, Baäpheth steeled his resolve and charged directly at Abanazaar. Both Primordials were rushing towards each other across the ravaged land, no fear to be seen. They collided with an almighty crash, the impact sending shockwaves of debris reverberating across the plain. As the dust cleared, only one figure remained standing, shield held aloft.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Armado con Gleidhir, Baäpheth reforzó su determinación y atacó directamente a Abanazaar. Ambos Primordiales corrían el uno hacia el otro a través de la tierra devastada, sin miedo a ser vistos. Se estrellaron con un choque tremendo, el impacto provocó ondas de choque de escombros que resonaron por toda el mundo. Cuando el polvo se despejó, solo una figura permaneció en pie, el escudo alzado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unstoppable Charge","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Carga Imparable"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control effects.\\n\\nReduces damage from projectiles while charging.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La carga no puede ser interrumpida por los efectos de control de masas.\\n\\nRecibe un daño reducido de los proyectiles mientras cargas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Overwhelming Impact","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Impacto Abrumador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Creates a damage-dealing shockwave at the end of the charge.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Creas una onda de choque que causa daño al final de la carga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Burning Lifeblood","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sangre Ardiente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leaves damaging areas of effect on the ground behind you, each one lasting for a few seconds.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deja en el suelo detrás de ti áreas de efecto dañinas, cada una de ellas con una duración de unos pocos segundos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Lingering Vision","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Visión Persistente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Spawns a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by this skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Engendra un aliado fantasma que golpea a un enemigo después de ser golpeado por esta habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Mania","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Manía"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grant Rage when hitting enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga Furia cuando golpeas a un enemigo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inflexible Stance","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Postura Inflexible"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage based on block chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño basado en la probabilidad de bloqueo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Gold Tooth Scavenger","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Carroñero de Dientes de Oro"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases block chance while charging.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de bloqueo durante for yourself and allies when charging.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga bonificaciones a todas las resistencias para ti y tus aliados al cargar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Stampede","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Estampida"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Marrow Eater","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Come-tuétanos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Righteous Bash","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Golpe Justo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inflicts Stun on enemies caught in the charge. Adds a cooldown to the skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aturde a los enemigos atrapados en la carga. Añade un tiempo de recarga a la habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Charge_variant_16_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Victorious Baäpheth approached his fallen foe. He raised his shield, and slammed it repeatedly into the face of the Primordial of Fire, flames bursting from the injured entity and turning to smoke. Under the weight of Gleidhir, all flames in the world went out, choked by Ambition and Industry’s combined forces.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El victorioso Baäpheth se acercó a su enemigo caído. Levantó su escudo y lo golpeó repetidamente contra la faz del Primordial del Fuego, las llamas brotaron de la criatura herida y se convirtieron en humo. Bajo el peso de Gleidhir, todas las llamas del mundo se apagaron, ahogadas por las fuerzas combinadas de la Ambición y la Industria."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Big Game Hunting","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Caza Mayor"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Marked enemies are more vulnerable to damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos marcados son más vulnerables al daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Weight of Infamy","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Peso de la Infamia"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Marked enemies are slowed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos marcados son ralentizados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inescapable Fate","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Destino Ineludible"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Marks have longer duration.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La marca dura más."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Fate of the Unholy","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Destino de los Impíos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enemies killed while under the effect of Mark of Impurity explode and deal damage based on the target's max Health in an area around them.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos que mueren bajo el efecto de Marca de Impureza explotan e infligen daño basándose en la Vida máxima del objetivo en un área a su alrededor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The embodiment of purity is considered to be many things depending on perspective: one of the last Primordials is a lethal purifier, or the apex of all demonhunters. He is a relentless killer of all that he deems unworthy of Creation's prime vision. Some see him as an insane being, a murdering absolute, others as one of the last reasons the Fallen haven't taken over the world and still secretly fear his name: Sarisel. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La encarnación de la pureza se puede considerar como muchas cosas dependiendo de la perspectiva: uno de los últimos Primordiales es un purificador letal, o el ápice de todos los cazadores de demonios. Es un implacable asesino de todo lo que considera indigno de la visión primaria de la Creación. Algunos lo ven como un ser loco, un absoluto asesino, otros como una de las últimas razones por las que los caídos no se han apoderado del mundo y siguen temiendo secretamente su nombre: Sarisel. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Target Eliminated","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Objetivo Eliminado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage on marked enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico en los enemigos marcados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Minimal Resistance","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Resistencia Mínima"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on marked enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Defect of Creation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Defecto de Creación"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage on marked enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia en los enemigos marcados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Guilt by Association","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Culpable por Asociación"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Mark of Impurity spreads to surrounding enemies on the death of the target.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La Marca de Impureza se extiende a los enemigos circundantes a la muerte del objetivo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sarisel isn't known for his tolerance or empathy. He is a killer, a punisher, a purifier. He destroys all those that he associates with the evils of the world and the abominations they create. Once Marked by Impurity, there is no explanation, no second chance and no justice, just blind purification for all involved.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sarisel no es conocido por su tolerancia o empatía. Es un asesino, un castigador, un purificador. Destruye a todos aquellos que asocia con los males del mundo y las abominaciones que crean. Una vez Marcado por la Impureza, no hay explicación, no hay segunda oportunidad y no hay justicia, solo purificación ciega para todos los involucrados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Accursed Blade","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Hoja Maldita"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Marked enemies are inflicted with numerous stacks of Cursed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos marcados son infligidos con numerosas acumulaciones de Maldición."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_9_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sarisel buries his weapons in the ground when they have soaked up too much blood, justifying that no thing tainted with evil in its essence could possibly do good. They remain in the ground, seeming like the bones of the world. These relics of Primordial sins have a power, emanating a curse on the towns built above. Not only do they draw the life from all things above that once thrived, but they invite hate and gratuitous violence among the people on the surface.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sarisel entierra sus armas en el suelo cuando han absorbido demasiada sangre, justificando que ninguna cosa contaminada con el mal en su esencia podría hacer el bien. Permanecen en la tierra, pareciendo los huesos del mundo. Estas reliquias de los pecados primitivos tienen un poder, que emana una maldición sobre las ciudades construidas arriba. No sólo extraen la vida de todas las cosas de arriba que una vez prosperaron, sino que invitan al odio y a la violencia gratuita entre la gente de la superficie."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Strange Mercy","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Misericordia Extraña"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Marked enemies under 10% health die instantly when hit.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos marcados con menos de un 10% de Vida mueren instantáneamente al ser golpeados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Faceless Justice","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Justicia sin Rostro"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance to spawn a ghost ally when a marked enemy is hit that will hit the enemy again.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de generar un aliado fantasma cuando se golpea a un enemigo marcado que volverá a golpear al enemigo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Weight of Culpability","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Peso de Culpabilidad"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Marked enemies are more vulnerable to damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos marcados son más vulnerables al daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Watchful más."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sinners Without Exception","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Pecadores sin Excepción"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DeathMark_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL Superdenso"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cosmic Ambush","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Emboscada Cósmica"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Teleport behind the target.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Teletransporte detrás del objetivo.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Merging two moons inside something as tiny as a blade is a dangerous endeavor even for a Primordial. Without proper mastery the resulting object could become so dense that it would crumble and become an all-devouring black hole. This intense power can manipulate time and space itself.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Fusionar dos lunas dentro de algo tan pequeño como una espada es un esfuerzo peligroso incluso para un Primordial. Sin la maestría adecuada, el objeto resultante podría volverse tan denso que se desintegraría y se convertiría en un agujero negro que lo devoraría todo. Este intenso poder puede manipular el propio tiempo y espacio."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Piercing Shadows","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sombras Perforantes"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Shadow damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño de Sombra.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Maldición."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sazanek was gifted to Moros to thank him for his assistance. The Primordial of Dusk had little use for such a weapon, but carried it with him as a sign of Hephaäron’s gratitude. Over time, the blades absorbed his crepuscular energy and changed color from a gleaming silver to a deep dark blue. It was returned to the Armory of Creation before long, Moros was concerned that a weapon of such quality would never be used.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sazanek fue regalado a Moros para agradecerle su ayuda. El Primordial del Anochecer apenas necesitaba un arma así, pero la llevaba consigo como muestra de la gratitud de Hephaäron. Con el tiempo, las hojas absorbieron su energía crepuscular y cambiaron de color, de un plateado resplandeciente a un azul oscuro profundo. Fue devuelto a la Armería de la Creación en poco tiempo, Moros estaba preocupado de que un arma de tal calidad nunca fuera usada."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Flashing Blades","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Hojas Brillantes"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Every time the skill is re-cast within a short period of time, its damage is increased.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cada vez que la habilidad se relanza en un corto periodo de tiempo, su daño aumenta."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Final Eclipse","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Eclipse Final"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Curse of the Dark Crescent","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Maldición del Creciente Oscuro"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enemies killed by this skill transmit Ailments to other enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos que mueren con esta habilidad transmiten dolencias a otros enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Dazzling Sweep","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Barrido Deslumbrante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"After completing a dash, enemies in 360 degrees are knocked back.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Después de completar una carga, los enemigos en 360 grados son derribados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Kindly Stopped For Me","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Amablemente Paró por Mí"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance to spawn a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by this skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Engendra un aliado fantasma que golpea a un enemigo después de ser golpeado por esta habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Trail Of Dust","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rastro de Polvo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"All enemies in the path of the dash are hit.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Todos los enemigos en el camino de la carga son golpeados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Crepuscular Escalation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Escalada Crepuscular"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hitting an enemy spawns two damaging projectiles behind them.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Golpear a un enemigo genera dos proyectiles dañinos detrás de ellos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_12_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The two moons were hurled toward Hephaäron's forges to destroy them, a parting gift from his disciple Ezaneal. The Primordial Craftsman was out of time to save himself as well as his hard work. But Moros, the Primordial of Dusk intervened to shroud the enormous projectiles in his shadows, changing their course to collide against one another. Hephaäron seized the momentum to heat, fuse and concentrate the metal they contained into a blade that he would call Sazanek.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Las dos lunas fueron arrojadas hacia las forjas de Hephaäron para destruirlas, un regalo de despedida de su discípulo Ezaneal. Al artesano primordial se le había acabado el tiempo para salvarse a sí mismo y también a su duro trabajo. Pero Moros, el Primordial del Anochecer, intervino para cubrir los enormes proyectiles en sus sombras, cambiando su curso para chocar entre ellos. Hephaäron aprovechó el impulso para calentar, fusionar y concentrar el metal que contenían en una hoja que él llamaría Sazanek."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Resentment's Foe","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Enemigo del Rencor"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hundredth Cut","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Corte Centésimo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Knife Unseen","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuchillo Invisible"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Effortless Slice","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rebanar sin Esfuerzo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_DualStrike_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Engulfing Desires","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deseos Envolventes"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Passions Aflame","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Pasiones en Llamas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Heartpiercer","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Perforacorazones"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Projectiles no longer collide or explode. Instead, they gain an increased area of effect and Pierce enemies. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los proyectiles ya no chocan ni explotan. En su lugar, obtienen una mayor área de efecto y perforan a los objetivos. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_3_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Jealousy goes hand in hand with envy. Abanazaar's obsessive desire to own Anathëa created in him a raging madness when he discovered her heart already belonged to Moros, Primordial of Dusk. Ever since, Abanazaar has tried to smother all the darkness and twilights of the world, illuminating them with his fiery lights, turning landscapes to smoldering pile of embers if he has to, as long as no shadows remain, eradicating all traces of his rival's legacy.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los celos van de la mano con la envidia. El deseo obsesivo de Abanazaar de poseer a Anathëa provocó en él una furiosa locura cuando descubrió que su corazón ya pertenecía a Moros, Primordial del Anochecer. Desde entonces, Abanazaar ha intentado sofocar toda la oscuridad y los crepúsculos del mundo, iluminándolos con sus luces ardientes, convirtiendo los paisajes en una pila de ascuas incandescentes si es necesario, mientras no queden sombras, erradicando así todo rastro del legado de su rival."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Incendiary Message","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mensaje Incendiario"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Adds one projectile at an increased cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Añade un proyectil a un coste mayor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Fratricidal Reunification","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reunificación Fratricida"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Fire damage to Lightning damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño de Fuego base en daño Eléctrico.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"As much as Abanazaar and his cult represent a powerful and destructive force, they remain both predator and prey. Beelmalik, Fallen Lord of Punishment, aims to destroy the cult of Envy to reunite with his brother. His Entropic Judges are always on the hunt to reveal and obliterate secret organizations devoted to Abanazaar.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"A pesar de que Abanazaar y su culto representan una fuerza poderosa y destructiva, siguen siendo depredadores y presas. Beelmalik, el Señor Caído del Castigo, pretende destruir el Culto de la Envidia para reunirse con su hermano. Sus Jueces Entrópicos siempre están de cacería para revelar y destruir organizaciones secretas dedicadas a Abanazaar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Volatile Embers","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Áscua Volátil"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Instant Ignition","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ignición Instantánea"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Object of Desire","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Objeto de Deseo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Gives a buff that allows you to deal additional damage based on the base element of this skill. Allies affected by the skill’s area of effect will also receive this buff.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un beneficio que te permite infligir daño adicional basado en el elemento base de esta habilidad. Los aliados afectados por el área de efecto de la habilidad también recibirán este beneficio."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"In his maddening desire for Anathëa, the Lord of Envy and his cult would abduct high ranking members of the Brotherhood of Dawn and perform unfathomable, twisted rituals on them until they become Sunslayers: dreadful fiery humans vaguely evocative of the way he sees her. In a way, by absorbing her followers into his own cult, she becomes his symbolically.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"En su deseo enloquecedor por Anathëa, el Señor de la Envidia y su culto secuestrarían a miembros de alto rango de la Hermandad del Amanecer y les realizarían rituales insondables y retorcidos hasta que se convirtieran en Asesinos del Sol: espantosos seres humanos que evocan vagamente la forma en que la ve. En cierto modo, al absorber a sus seguidores en su propio culto, ella se convierte simbólicamente en su seguidor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Meteor Shower","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lluvia de Meteoritos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases number of projectiles, but each projectile's damage is reduced.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el número de proyectiles, pero el daño de cada proyectil se reduce."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Fervor's Smoke","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Humo del Fervor"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When re-cast, projectiles explode in a larger area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando se vuelven a lanzar, los proyectiles explotan en un área de efecto más grande."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_10_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"One of the first things that Abanazaar saw when he came to be, was the sunrise on the horizon. The moment he saw it, he knew he wanted to reach and own it. It quickly turned to passion and love for Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. It finally devolved into obsessive and destructive madness when he realized that someone else owned her affections.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Una de las primeras cosas que Abanazaar vio cuando nació fue el amanecer en el horizonte. En el momento en que lo vio, supo que quería alcanzarlo y poseerlo. Rápidamente se convirtió en pasión y amor por Anathëa, la Dama del Amanecer. Al final se convirtió en una locura obsesiva y destructiva cuando se dio cuenta de que alguien más era dueño de su amor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Immolator","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Inmolador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Arsonist's Daydream","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sueño de un Pirómano"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Willpower cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Voluntad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Lingering Burn","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Quemadura Persistente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Plasmic State","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Modo Plasmático"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Catching Spark","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Capturar la Chispa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases cast speed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de lanzamiento."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Lord of Char","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Señor de la Carbonación"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Fireball_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage. Adds a cooldown to the skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño. Añade un tiempo de recarga a la habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unrestrained Misery","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Miseria desenfrenada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sorrowful Attunement","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sintonización Dolorosa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Willpower cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Voluntad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Malignant Narcissism","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Narcisismo Maligno"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces the delay before the mass of ice falls.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el retraso antes de que la masa de hielo caiga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Avalanche of Emotion","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Avalanche de Emoción"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Scorned by Fire","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Despreciado por el Fuego"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Frost damage to Fire damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño de Hielo base en daño de Fuego.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Etheliel chased Abanazaar as he rampaged through the plains, begging him to rejoin her and Beelmalik as the Primordial of Change. The constant pleading ignited his temper and Abanazaar threw a huge boulder at her for interrupting his quest for love. It flew with such rage that it caught aflame. It landed a glancing blow on Etheliel and she fled, wracked with guilt for their separation.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Etheliel persiguió a Abanazaar mientras recorría el mundo, rogándole que se reuniera con ella y con Beelmalik como el Primordial del Cambio. La constante súplica despertó su temperamento y Abanazaar le lanzó una enorme roca para interrumpir su búsqueda de amor. Se enfureció tanto que se prendió fuego. Golpeó a Etheliel y esta huyó, llena de culpa por su separación."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Corrupting Wail","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lamento Corruptor"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Frozen Impurities","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Impurezas Congeladas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grieving Melancholy","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Melancolía de Luto"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases the delay before the mass of ice falls and increases its damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el retraso antes de que la masa de hielo caiga y aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"While no-one knows precisely where to find Etheliel, myths tell the story of a freezing wail that echoes throughout the tall mountains that link the three continents of Wolcen. A cry so mournful that it seems to lament Creation itself.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aunque nadie sabe exactamente dónde encontrar a Etheliel, los mitos cuentan la historia de un lamento helado que resuena en las altas montañas que unen los tres continentes de Wolcen. Un grito tan afligido que parece lamentar la propia creación."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Stalactite Rain","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lluvia de Estalactitas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Alters the skill so that it deals damage over time.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Altera la habilidad para que cause daño con el tiempo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_9_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Many a scar lies carved into Wolcen’s soil: the Rift dug by the conflict of Genesis, the craters blasted by Hephaäron’s creations, and the vortices created by Anulai-Tai’s comings and goings are only a few examples. But as Etheliel laments these blemishes on the beauty of Wolcen, she cannot help but make it worse, drilling into the land with disproportionately large hail as she weeps.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Hay muchas cicatrices talladas en el suelo de Wolcen: la Grieta cavada por el conflicto del Génesis, los cráteres destruidos por las creaciones de Hephaäron y los vórtices creados por las idas y venidas de Anulai-Tai son solo algunos ejemplos. Pero mientras Etheliel lamenta estas manchas en la belleza de Wolcen, no puede evitar empeorarla perforando la tierra con un granizo desproporcionado mientras llora"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Glass Firmament","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Firmamento de Cristal"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Allows you to charge Tear of Etheliel by maintaining its cast. Each level of charge it reaches increases its damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Te permite cargar Lágrima de Etheliel manteniendo su lanzamiento. Cada nivel de carga que se alcanza aumenta su daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_10_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Etheliel was enamored of the city of Arborrel, and sought to protect it from the vagaries of time by encases it into an ice cage. The First Men inside hesitated, fearing blasphemy, but soon enough shot their arrows into the ice to free themselves. Etheliel’s love rained down on them, piercing roofs and crushing civilian and soldier without distinction.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Etheliel estaba enamorada de la ciudad de Arborrel, y trató de protegerla de los caprichos del tiempo encerrándola en una jaula de hielo. Los Primeros Hombres que estaban dentro dudaron temiendo la blasfemia, pero pronto dispararon sus flechas en el hielo para liberarse. El amor de Etheliel llovió sobre ellos, perforando los tejados y aplastando a civiles y soldados sin distinción."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Dizzying Whiteout","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Apagón Vertiginoso"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Body's Water","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Agua del Cuerpo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Meteorological Grip","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Control Meteorológico"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Absolute Zero","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cero Absoluto"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Climactic Domination","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Dominación Climática"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sanguine Crystallization","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cristalización Sanguínea"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostComet_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage and increases Willpower cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño y coste de Voluntad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Crystal Javelin","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Jabalina de Cristal"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Boon of the Usurper","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ventaja del Usurpador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Willpower cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Voluntad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Comet Ballista","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Balista Cometa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Longer creation delay but Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mayor retraso en la creación, pero aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shattering Blasphemy","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Blasfemia Destructiva"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enemies killed while they are frozen have a chance to cast ice shards around them in an explosion.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos asesinados mientras están congelados tienen la oportunidad de arrojar fragmentos de hielo a su alrededor en una explosión."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Etheliel is not just hateful against the usurpers of her freezing powers, she becomes absolutely frenzied when she confronts sorcerers that dare to summon her powers to tear apart the beauty of Creation. Ironically, dreadful destructive blizzards spread around her when she loses control and exacts her vengeance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Etheliel no solo odia a los usurpadores de sus poderes de congelación, sino que se vuelve absolutamente frenética cuando se enfrenta a hechiceros que se atreven a invocar sus poderes para desgarrar la belleza de la Creación. Irónicamente, espantosas ventiscas destructivas se extienden a su alrededor cuando pierde el control y exige su venganza."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Beauty of Hope","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Belleza de Esperanza"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Frost damage to Sacred damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Weakness.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño de Hielo base en daño Sagrado.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Debilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The beauty that Etheliel seeks is one of objectivity and superficiality. When she freezes beautiful individuals, they are preserved with a neutral facial expression. On the contrary, Anathëa’s beauty comes from hope, and her radiant smile made the Fallen Lady of Vanity momentarily question the legitimacy of her plight. But Etheliel was not to be convinced by such folly.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La belleza que busca Etheliel es la de la objetividad y la superficialidad. Cuando congela a individuos hermosos, se conservan con una expresión facial neutra. Por el contrario, la belleza de Anathëa viene de la esperanza, y su sonrisa radiante hizo que la Dama Caída de la Vanidad cuestionara momentáneamente la legitimidad de su difícil situación. Pero Etheliel no debía dejarse convencer por tal locura."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"An Ominous Chill","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Un Frío Siniestro"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Puncturing Icicle","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Témpano Perforante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Prolonged Deceit","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Engaño Prolongado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Every Arctic Spear that hits an enemy increases the damage of the next Arctic Spear incrementally. This buff is reset when an Arctic Spear misses.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cada Lanza Ártica que golpea a un enemigo aumenta el daño de la siguiente Lanza Ártica de forma incremental. Este beneficio se reajusta cuando una Lanza Ártica falla."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hiemal Ambush","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Emboscada Hiemal"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Spears created are delayed while re-casting, allowing you cast multiple spears at once.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Las lanzas creadas se retrasan durante el relanzamiento, permitiéndote lanzar varias lanzas a la vez."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_9_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Tricking the Fallen of Vanity into making her believe that you are a gateway for her will is a dangerous endeavour: a group of her cultists known as the Diamond Legion hunts down and captures usurpers, afflicting them with a frozen eternal torment.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Engañar a la Caída de la Vanidad para hacerle creer que eres la puerta de entrada para su voluntad es un esfuerzo peligroso: un grupo de sus seguidores conocidos como la Legión de los Diamantes caza y captura a los usurpadores, afligiéndolos con un tormento eterno y congelado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sublime Fracture","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Fractura Sublime"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"While travelling, the spear releases smaller spears. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Durante el recorrido, la lanza libera lanzas más pequeñas. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hypothermic Vulnerability","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Vulnerabilidad Hipotérmica"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cold Perforation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Perforación Helada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cold Regard","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mirada Fría"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Freezing Skewers","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Pinchos de Congelación"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Crooked Jab","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Empuje Torcido"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Organic Temperature Shift","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cambio Orgánico de Temperatura"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostLance_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage. Adds a cooldown to the skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño. Añade un tiempo de recarga a la habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Rime World","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mundo Congelado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ice Pawn","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Peón de hielo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Immortalized Perfection","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Perfección Inmortalizada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Freeze duration.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la duración de la congelación."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Admire from a Distance","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Admira a Distancia"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Winter's Grasp is cast in a circle around the cursor.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Se lanza Alcance del Invierno en un círculo alrededor del cursor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hidden temples of Etheliel are haunting sights: their chilling halls display all types of frozen creatures that were brought there for 'immortality' by cultists. In order to curry her favor, the cultists have unholy rituals at the heart of the temple where they freeze young, beautiful prisoners as sacrifice.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los templos ocultos de Etheliel son paisajes inolvidables: sus escalofriantes salones muestran todo tipo de criaturas congeladas que fueron llevadas allí para la \"inmortalidad\" por los cultores. Para conseguir su favor, los cultores tienen rituales impíos en el corazón del templo, donde congelan a jóvenes y hermosas prisioneras como sacrificio."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Concentrated Shadow","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sombra Concentrada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Frost damage to Shadow damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño de Hielo base en daño de Sombra.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Maldición."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The ice of the Lady of Vanity has lost its natural purity since she became a Fallen. Now it is filled with a lethal determination to spread over the world, a desire to fill each shadow with ice as shadow fills her heart. Through her unholy touch, Moros channels his remaining power, spreading his tainted shadow across the mortal plain. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El hielo de la Dama de la Vanidad ha perdido su pureza natural desde que se convirtió en una Caída. Ahora está lleno de una determinación letal de extenderse por todo el mundo, un deseo de llenar cada sombra con hielo como sombra llena su corazón. A través de su toque impío, Moros canaliza el poder que le queda, extendiendo su sombra contaminada a través del mundo mortal. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Biting Cold","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mordedura Gélida"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"PermaFrost","TRANSLATED TEXT":"PermaHielo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leaves a damaging area on the ground for a few seconds.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Dejas un área de daño en el suelo durante unos segundos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hail the Ice Queen","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Salve, Reina de Hielo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Gives a buff that allows you to deal additional damage based on the base element of this skill. Allies affected by the skill’s area of effect will also receive this buff.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un beneficio que te permite infligir daño adicional basado en el elemento base de esta habilidad. Los aliados afectados por el área de efecto de la habilidad también recibirán este beneficio."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Etheliel knows generosity when it comes to sharing her power with mortals: she sees sorcerers and cultists as mere pawns serving her great ambition whenever they summon her cold embrace. Every time her Frost touches the world, she moves one step closer to her ultimate victory. In a way, ignorant sorcerers are just as dangerous as malignant cultists.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Etheliel conoce la generosidad a la hora de compartir su poder con los mortales: ve a los hechiceros y a los cultores como meros peones al servicio de su gran ambición cada vez que invocan su frío abrazo. Cada vez que su hielo toca el mundo, se acerca un paso más a su victoria final. En cierto modo, los hechiceros ignorantes son tan peligrosos como los cultores malignos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Glacial Blast","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Explosión Glacial"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enemies killed while frozen by this skill trigger another ice nova.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos asesinados mientras están congelados por esta habilidad desencadenan otra nova de hielo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_FrostNova_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Soul in Emanation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Alma en aturdidos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chain-slinger","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lanzacadenas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grant Rage for each enemy hit by this ability.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga Furia por cada enemigo golpeado por esta habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Bold Move","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Movimiento Audaz"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Pulls you toward the final target of the hook.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Te impulsas hacia el objetivo final del gancho."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Equipped with Kirenas, Sarisel was fighting a powerful demon lord. He used the grappling hook to pull it to him, but the demon was too strong and stood firm. The two gauged each other for a moment, holding the chain. That's when Sarisel chose to revert the mechanism of Kirenas, pulling himself towards his target. Caught off-guard, the demon lord was put down in a single blow to the head.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Equipado con Kirenas, Sarisel luchaba contra un poderoso señor de los demonios. Usó el gancho de agarre para tirar de él, pero el demonio era demasiado fuerte y se mantuvo firme. Los dos se midieron el uno al otro por un momento, sosteniendo la cadena. Fue entonces cuando Sarisel decidió revertir el mecanismo de Kirenas, tirando de sí mismo hacia su objetivo. Con la guardia baja, el señor de los demonios fue abatido de un solo golpe en la cabeza."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Deep Gashes","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cortes Profundos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Deals Rend damage.\\n\\nApplies an additional stack when inflicting Bleed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Inflige daño de Desgarro.\\n\\nInflige una acumulación adicional cuando infliges Sangrado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sarisel did not sharpen Kirenas - the nicks and scratches that it picked up were like war trophies to him. This decay would never destroy the hook, for it was crafted by Hephaaron, but the imperfections added a new level of lethality. The notches dug into the hook’s target, lacerating the flesh of Sarisel’s quarry.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sarisel no afiló a Kirenas - las muescas y arañazos que recibió eran como trofeos de guerra para él. Esta degradación nunca destruiría el gancho, ya que fue hecho a mano por Hephaäron, pero las imperfecciones añadieron un nuevo nivel de letalidad. Las muescas se clavaban en el blanco del gancho, lacerando la carne de la presa de Sarisel."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Preserving Momentum","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Preservando el Momento"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Feeding the Spirit","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Alimentando el Espíritu"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enemies hit by the hook are more likely to drop Health Globes.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos golpeados por el gancho son más propensos a dejar caer Esferas de Vida."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unrelenting Hunt","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Caza Implacable"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Pulls enemies from all directions.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Empuja a los enemigos de todas las direcciones."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sarisel, Primordial of Purity, is known for his obsessive hunts of all that he deems tainted. While he was in the possession of Kirenas, it quickly became the extension of his will, searching and reaching evil in the most obscure corners of the world.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sarisel, Primordial de la Pureza, es conocido por sus cacerías obsesivas de todo lo que considera contaminado. Mientras estuvo en posesión de Kirenas, se convirtió rápidamente en la extensión de su voluntad, buscando y alcanzando el mal en los rincones más oscuros del mundo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Arresting Claw","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Garras de Detención"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hook_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hook inflicts Stasis on continues to spin after being thrown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El hacha sigue girando después de ser lanzada."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ashkadi is designed to upset the natural order, which in return reacts the only way it knows: by trying to adjust itself. The energy deployed by natural laws to fix the unbalance is what fuels the spin. With sufficient expertise, the axe-thrower can keep it spinning in a way that defies gravity itself.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ashkadi está diseñado para alterar el orden natural, que a su vez reacciona de la única manera que conoce: intentando ajustarse a sí mismo. La energía desplegada por las leyes naturales para reparar el desequilibrio es lo que alimenta el giro. Con suficiente experiencia, el lanzador de hacha puede mantenerlo girando de una manera que desafía la propia gravedad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Will-o'-the-Wisp","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Fuego Fatuo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Fire damage instead of Rend damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño de Fuego en lugar de Daño de Desgarro.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ezaneal, Fallen Lord of Trickery, has always been Hephaäron's rival in terms of craftmanship and creativity. That rivalry led him to break into the Armory of Creation and steal Ashkadi to understand and further the design. He convinced Abanazaar, the fallen Lord of Envy, to imbue the blade with ethereal fire. Ashkadi was later recovered but the design was tainted forever.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ezaneal, el Señor Caído del Engaño, siempre ha sido el rival de Hephaäron en términos de artesanía y creatividad. Esa rivalidad le llevó a entrar en la Armería de la Creación y robar Ashkadi para entender y avanzar en el diseño. Convenció a Abanazaar, el caído Señor de la Envidia, para que impregnara la espada con fuego etéreo. Más tarde se recuperó Ashkadi, pero el diseño quedó contaminado para siempre."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"A Taste for Blood","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Un Gusto por la Sangre"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leech life from enemies when dealing damage with Bleeding Edge.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Absorbe vida de los enemigos cuando se inflige daño con Filo Sangrante."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Revolving Guillotine","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Guillotina Giratoria"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Astral Orbit","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Órbita Astral"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The axe now follows you as you move.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El hacha ahora te sigue mientras te mueves."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hephaäron did not only observe the trajectory of celestial bodies, he tailed one for an unreasonable amount of time, learning and mastering every aspect of its elliptic journey. Only then, did he start imagining Ashkadi's design, aiming to reproduce its graceful trajectory in a small object. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Hephaäron no solo observó la trayectoria de los cuerpos celestes, sino que siguió a uno de ellos durante una cantidad de tiempo irrazonable, aprendiendo y dominando cada aspecto de su viaje elíptico. Solo entonces, comenzó a imaginar el diseño de Ashkadi, con el objetivo de reproducir su trayectoria elegante en un pequeño objeto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cyclonic Expansion","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Expansión Ciclónica"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The reach of the spinning axe increases over time.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El alcance del hacha giratoria aumenta con el tiempo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Delayed Bladespin","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Giro Retardado de la Cuchilla"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Casts to the location of the cursor.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Se lanza en la ubicación del cursor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Despotic Perseverance","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Perseverancia Déspota"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laceration_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL
