TEXT":"Aumenta el radio del rayo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Puncturing Gaze","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mirada Perforante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Beam Pierces enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El láser perfora a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"In his madness, Anulai-Tai feels all the movements in the world and their destructive nature, like a fuzzy haze of blasphemy toward Creation. His gaze punctures through that haze, piercing space and flesh, seeking for targets to single out and lay to rest.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"En su locura, Anulai-Tai siente todos los movimientos del mundo y su naturaleza destructiva, como una neblina borrosa de blasfemia hacia la creación. Su mirada penetra a través de esa neblina, penetrando el espacio y la carne, buscando objetivos que señalar y ponerle fin."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inevitable Decay","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Caída Inevitable"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Aether damage to Toxic damage.\\n\\nApplies an additional stack when inflicting Poison.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño de Éter base en daño Tóxico.\\n\\nSe aplica una acumulación adicional cuando se inflige Veneno."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unlike Anulai-Tai, Bezeriel is not unnerved by the passage of time. The Fallen Archduke of Doom is only conscious of his hunger. Everything around him; his cultists, the other Abbathus, even the decomposing flesh he consumes, suffers over time, but not him. He thrives off of the decay, a scavenger of life and a timeless acquaintance of the Fallen Duke of Infinity.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"A diferencia de Anulai-Tai, Bezeriel no se asusta con el paso del tiempo. El Archiduque Caído de la Perdición solo es consciente de su hambre. Todo lo que le rodea; sus seguidores, el otro Abathus, incluso la carne en descomposición que consume, sufre con el tiempo, pero no él. Se desarrolla a partir de la descomposición, un carroñero de la vida y un eterno conocido del Duque Caído del Infinito."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Swing of the Pendulum","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Oscilación del Péndulo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases turn speed while the beam is being cast.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de giro durante el lanzamiento."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Catatonic Accumulation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Acumulación Catatónica"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Damage increases over time as the beam is being cast.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El daño aumenta gradualmente con el tiempo mientras se lanza el láser."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Temporal Condensation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Condensación Temporal"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The skill fires an additional beam.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La habilidad dispara un rayo adicional."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The cult of Infinity is a very dangerous one, their deadliest agents known as \"Time Devourers\", have specialized into isolating a foe from its normal bond to time, before discharging a tremendous amount of Aether unto the target. It accelerates its biorhythm so much that a mortal will grow old and die by the end of the channeling.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El culto del Infinito es muy peligroso, sus agentes más mortíferos conocidos como \"devoradores de tiempo\", se han especializado en aislar a un enemigo de su vínculo normal con el tiempo, antes de descargar una tremenda cantidad de éter en el objetivo. Acelera tanto su biorritmo que un mortal envejecerá y morirá al final de la canalización."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Toxic Entropy","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Entropía Tóxica"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Toxic and Aether damage for yourself and allies caught within the beam.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Veneno y de Éter para ti y tus aliados atrapados en el rayo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Laser_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Extravagant Blast","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Explosión damage-dealing shockwave upon landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Crea una onda expansiva que causa daño al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Baäpheth, former Primordial of Ambition, had a single training session with Ishmir. In the midst of the fight, he threw it with such power that it fended an entire mountain. Since then, the earth itself reacts strongly whenever The First Spear touches the ground.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Baäpheth, antiguo primordial de la ambición, tuvo una sola sesión de entrenamiento con Ishmir. En medio de la lucha, la lanzó con tal poder que se las apañó contra una montaña entera. Desde entonces, la tierra misma reacciona con fuerza cada vez que la primera lanza toca el suelo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shining Hope","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Esperanza Brillante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Sacred damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Weakness.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño Sagrado.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Debilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hephaäron forged magical neck rings for Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. With them, her voice of pure light was imbued and became the Searing Song, allowing her to pierce the darkest nights. In return she gave him a single bright smile, which he immortalized by infusing its sacred shimmer into the blade of Ishmir. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Hephaäron forjó anillos mágicos para el cuello de Anathëa, la Dama del Amanecer. Con ellos, impregnó su voz de luz pura y se convirtió en la Canción Ardiente, lo que le permitió perforar las noches más oscuras. A cambio, ella le dio una única y brillante sonrisa, que él inmortalizó infundiendo su sagrado brillo en la espada de Ishmir. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Heavy Impalement","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Empalamiento"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Overwhelming Tremor","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Terror Abrumador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Knockbacks enemies upon landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Derriba a los enemigos al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Relentless Pursuit","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Persecución Implacable"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Skill loses its cooldown and costs one Stamina Point to use instead.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La habilidad pierde su tiempo de recarga y cuesta un punto de Aguante."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The sight of the spear's head piercing the flesh, the painful deathrattle of the skewered foe, its warm blood splattering the face of the impaler: madmen and berserkers thirst for these grim sights to create an unstoppable momentum of destruction.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La visión de la cabeza de la lanza atravesando la carne, la dolorosa muerte del enemigo empalado, su sangre caliente salpicando la cara del empalador: locos y berserkers sedientos de estas sombrías vistas para crear un imparable momento de destrucción."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Noble Bearing","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Conducta Noble"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown for each hit that kills an enemy.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga por cada golpe que mate a un enemigo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Twisting Harbinger","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Precursor Retorcido"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Creates a vortex before landing that pulls in enemies within an area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Crea un vórtice antes de aterrizar que atrae a los enemigos dentro de un área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_10_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Baäpheth, former Primordial of Ambition, had a single training session with Ishmir. In the midst of the fight, he swung it through the air with such power that a cyclone gathered from his movement, and in the moment he released the spear in a mighty throw, lightning made a deep scar in the earth in the shape of a seemingly bottomless gulf. Since then, the air itself reacts strongly whenever The First Spear flies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Baäpheth, antiguo Primordial de la Ambición, tuvo una sola sesión de entrenamiento con Ishmir. En medio de la lucha, la lanzó por el aire con tal poder que un ciclón reunido comenzó a moverse y en el momento en que soltó la lanza en un poderoso lanzamiento, un rayo hizo una profunda cicatriz en la tierra en la forma de un abismo aparentemente sin fondo. Desde entonces, el propio aire reacciona con fuerza cada vez que La Primera Lanza vuela."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Trial Of Swindlers","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Juicio de los Condenados"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Regnerate Force Shield per enemy hit on landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Regenera Escudo de Fuerza por enemigo al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Stunning Apparatus","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aparato Impresionante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants a buff for each enemy hit on landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un beneficio por cada enemigo que golpeas al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Meritorious Crew","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tripulación Ejemplar"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Leap_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage dealt by yourself and allies in the area of effect on landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Draining Lifeforce","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Drenando Fuerza Vital"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Gain life leech on the damage dealt by this ability.\\n\\nThe lower your health, the more life leech you gain.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Con esta habilidad obtienes robo de vida en el daño infligido.\\n\\nCuanto más baja sea tu vida, más robo de vida obtendrás."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"After a close battle with Anathëa, Baäpheth was bound in chains made by Hephaäron and imprisoned in the camp of the Army of Genesis. The War of the Primordials raged in the distance as Baäpheth tried to regain his strength. While the chains were unbreakable, the wall was not, and Baäpheth saw that there was a chance to escape. With every struggle freedom felt slightly closer, reviving his strength with every exertion, until the wall collapsed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Después de una estrecha batalla con Anathëa, Baäpheth fue encadenado por Hephaäron y encarcelado en el campamento del Ejército del Génesis. La Guerra de los Primordiales se desató en la distancia mientras Baäpheth intentaba recuperar sus fuerzas. Aunque las cadenas eran irrompibles, el muro no lo era, y Baäpheth vio que había una oportunidad de escapar. Con cada esfuerzo más se acercaba la libertad, reavivando su fuerza a cada paso, hasta que el muro se derrumbó."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Stolen Light","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Luz Robada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Sacred damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Weakness.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño Sagrado.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Debilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When Baäpheth was captured by Anathëa and her Army of Genesis, the guards could not hold him long. A regiment of them rushed to his captivity chamber after hearing a commotion. Baäpheth swung wildly with his shackled arm and the chain cut clean through the first soldier’s armored torso. An arrogant smirk spread across Baäpheth’s face as he wrapped the chains around his hands. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando Baäpheth fue capturado por Anathëa y su ejército del Génesis, los guardias no pudieron retenerlo mucho tiempo. Un regimiento de guardias corrió a su cámara de cautiverio después de escuchar el alboroto. Baäpheth se balanceó salvajemente con su brazo encadenado y la cadena cortó limpiamente el torso blindado del primer soldado. Una sonrisa arrogante se extendió por la cara de Baäpheth mientras envolvía las cadenas alrededor de sus manos. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Lethal Ambitions","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ambiciones Letales"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Out for Blood","TRANSLATED TEXT":"En Busca de Sangre"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Taste for Vengeance","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Gusto por la Venganza"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Add an additional attack to the combo.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Añade un ataque adicional al combo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Blood Brothers","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Hermanos de Sangre"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants a life leech buff to yourself and allies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Te otorga a ti y a tus aliados un beneficio de robo de vida."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Primal Rush","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ímpetu Primitivo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Rage generated when killing an enemy.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Genera Furia al matar a un enemigo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Final Moments","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Momentos Finales"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage based on the amount of missing health you have.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño basado en la cantidad de vida perdida que tienes."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_11_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"A whirlwind of death, Baäpheth struck fear into the hearts of the Army of Genesis. Every shriek and deathrattle transferred sacred energy gifted by Lady of Dawn to the enraged Primordial of Ambition. He feasted on this power, using it to eviscerate every obstacle between him and his adversary. He stood in the face of Anathëa, coated in gore and with madness in his eyes, ready to tear her to shreds with the chains she used to imprison him and the Sacred strength of her own army.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Un torbellino de muerte, Baäpheth infundió miedo en los corazones del Ejército del Génesis. Cada grito y cada agonía transfería la energía sagrada donada por la Dama del Amanecer al enfurecido Primordial de la Ambición. Se dio un festín con este poder, usándolo para destripar todos los obstáculos entre él y su adversario. Se puso de pie frente a Anathëa, recubierto de sangre y con locura en sus ojos, dispuesto a hacerla trizas con las cadenas que ella usaba para encarcelarle a él y la fuerza sagrada de su propio ejército."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Wounded Pride","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Orgullo Herido"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Attrition","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Desgaste"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Reave_variant_14","ORIGINAL Esperanza"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants buff to all resistances while inside the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un beneficio a todas las resistencias mientras estés dentro del área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Blade of Truth","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Hoja de la Mañana"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Healing area of effect becomes centered at cursor location.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto de curación se centra ahora en la posición del cursor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The Lady of Dawn is a benevolent Primordial who defends Creation against the Fallen. She rules over the concepts of Dawn, Hope, Truth and Rebirth. She tries to shepherd mankind into her humbling light while giving it the powers to survive against supernatural invasions.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La Dama del Amanecer es una Primordial benévola que defiende a la Creación contra los Caídos. Gobierna sobre los conceptos de Amanecer, Esperanza, Verdad y Renacimiento. Intenta guiar a la humanidad hacia su humilde luz mientras le da los poderes para sobrevivir a las invasiones sobrenaturales."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Embracing Conviction","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convicción"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Allows the healing area of effect to be moved by re-casting the ability.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto de la curación puede ser reposicionada al relanzar la habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Facing the injustice and perils of the world, some have lost faith in Anathëa's existence on the claim that through recorded history, she never intervened herself to help Creation. Some Brothers chose to fight off this faithlessness by becoming \"Hierophants of the Searing Song\", battlepriests that preach her prayers and blessings to shield mankind from evil.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ante la injusticia y los peligros del mundo, algunos han perdido la fe en la existencia de Anathëa al afirmar que, a lo largo de la historia, ella nunca intervino para ayudar a la Creación. Algunos hermanos optaron por luchar contra esta falta de fe convirtiéndose en \"Hierofantes de la Canción Ardiente\", sacerdotes de batalla que predican sus oraciones y bendiciones para proteger a la humanidad del mal."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Boundless Cornucopia","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cornucopia Ilimitada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases healing rate.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la frecuencia de curación."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Rejuvenating Light","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Luz Rejuvenecedora"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases stamina regeneration while inside the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la regeneración de aguante mientras se está dentro del área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Divine Omnipresence","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Omnipresencia Divina"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The healing area of effect follows the player that it was cast on.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto de la curación sigue al jugador sobre el que fue lanzado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The Brotherhood of Dawn worships Anathëa. Even after being chased from the Kingdom of Alia once the United Republic of Mankind took over, they stayed true to their oaths and remained powerful knights, shielding innocents from the terrors of the night.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La Hermandad del Amanecer adora a Anathëa. Incluso después de haber sido expulsados del Reino de Alia una vez que la República Unida de la Humanidad tomó el poder, permanecieron fieles a sus juramentos y siguieron siendo caballeros poderosos, protegiendo a los inocentes de los terrores de la noche."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Burning Balm","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Bálsamo Quemado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies while inside the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad TEXT":"Increases health regeneration per tick.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la regeneración de vida por tic."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SacredGround_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Extended damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Light Frame","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Peso Pluma"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Rage cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Furia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Focused Shot","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Disparo Enfocado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces number of projectiles but increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el número de proyectiles reducido pero aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Explosive Barrage","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Bombardeo Explosivo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Arrows explode on enemy contact. Cannot pierce enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Las flechas explotan al contacto con el enemigo. No puede atravesar enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"While Hephaäron built Krearion, his apprentice was in charge of creating its arrows. He experimented with the design, and decided on an explosive arrowhead as standard. Hephaäron was furious and claimed that the apprentice was unable to understand the purity of his design. Such crass, mindless violence contrasts with Hephaäron’s finely crafted weapons that carried out their function efficiently and with simplicity. This disagreement was the first step towards eccentricity that led Ezaneal to be the devious inventor he is today.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mientras Hephaäron construía Krearion, su aprendiz se encargaba de crear sus flechas. Experimentó con el diseño y se decidió por una punta de flecha explosiva como estándar. Hephaäron estaba furioso y afirmó que el aprendiz era incapaz de entender la pureza de su diseño. Esta violencia grosera e irreflexiva contrasta con las armas finamente diseñadas de Hephaäron, que desempeñaban su función de manera eficiente y sencilla. Este desacuerdo fue el primer paso hacia la excentricidad que llevó a Ezaneal a ser el artero inventor que es hoy."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unnatural Causes","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Causas no Naturales"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Toxic damage.\\n\\nApplies an additional stack when inflicting Poison.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño Tóxico.\\n\\nInflige una acumulación adicional cuando se inflige Veneno."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The bow is the most common weapon for hunters in the cult of Bezeriel. As they collect flesh for him to consume, yanking out the arrows from the corpses, the arrowheads become more and more putrid as the gory residue builds up between each kill. It rots over time, making each shot ever more lethal.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El arco es el arma más común para los cazadores en el Culto de Bezeriel. A medida que recogen carne para que la consuma, arrancando las flechas de los cadáveres, las puntas de las flechas se vuelven más y más putrefactas a medida que el residuo sangriento se acumula entre cada muerte. Se pudre con el tiempo, haciendo que cada disparo sea cada vez más letal."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Siege Tactics","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tácticas de Asedio"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Pincushion","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Alfiletero"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases number of projectiles.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el número de proyectiles."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Phantom Volley","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lluvia Fantasmal"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Summon ghosts to shoot arrows alongside you.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Invoca fantasmas para que disparen flechas a tu lado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Of Storms' Past","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Pasado de la Tormenta"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance to spawn a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by your arrows.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de engendrar un aliado fantasma que golpea a un enemigo después de ser golpeado por tus flechas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ardent Nock","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Flecha Ardiente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases cast speed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de lanzamiento."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cleaving Race","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Raza Dividida"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage for each remaining Pierce.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño por cada Perforación restante."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Pride Of The Deerstalker","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Orgullo del Cazaciervos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Charge the shot, firing a volley for each charge level reached.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Carga el disparo, disparando una salva por cada nivel de carga alcanzado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_12_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The creation of Krearion served as inspiration for all humans to create their own bows. As archery became more widespread, Krearion gathered power within itself, which cried out in great volleys. For every bow strung, Krearion’s shadow is cast wider and longer than ever.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La creación de Krearion sirvió de inspiración para que todos los humanos crearan sus propios arcos. A medida que el tiro con arco se fue extendiendo, Krearion acumuló poder dentro de sí mismo, lo que se manifestó en grandes voleas. Por cada arco que se ensarta, la sombra de Krearion se proyecta más ancha y más larga que nunca."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Whitefield Arrowheads","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Flechas Whitefield"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Frost damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño de Hielo.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_13_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Those wanderers from the most hostile regions of Varg speak of a legend. A lone wandering figure in furs, whose arrows turn their target into statues of ice. Some believe him an envoy of a higher power. Others still believe that his arrows are the product of some advanced craft, and that his technique might be uncovered if one adventures far enough into his territory.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Esos nómadas de las regiones más hostiles de Varg hablan de una leyenda. Una solitaria figura errante en pieles, cuyas flechas convierten su objetivo en estatuas de hielo. Algunos creen que es un enviado de un poder superior. Otros aún creen que sus flechas son el producto de algún conocimiento avanzado y que su técnica podría ser descubierta si uno se adentra lo suficiente en su territorio."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Persistent Limp","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cojera Persistente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Pulmonary Strike","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Golpe Pulmonar"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cruel Songbird","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Canto Cruel"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SpreadShot_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Escape Artist","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Artista de la Evasión"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases teleport range.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el rango de teletransporte."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Magnetic Weight","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Peso Magnético"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enemies near the beginning and end of the teleport are inflicted with Stasis.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los enemigos de cerca del principio y del final del teletransporte resultan infligidos con Inmovilización."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Feeding the Aether","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Alimentando el Éter"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Gain Willpower for each enemy passed through with Aether Jump.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Obtienes Voluntad por cada enemigo que atravieses con Salto Etéreo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Spatial Puppeteer","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Titiritero Espacial"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Swap position with enemies around the target location of the teleport.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cambia de posición con los enemigos alrededor de la ubicación del teletransporte."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"After a certain threshold, mastering the Aether drifts in focus. The temptation to use it to reshape the world becomes irresistible, regardless of the risks of butterfly effect. Manipulating it from afar and remoulding the thread that connects every being to it becomes a nefarious call that eventually leads to a failing moral system and a predatory behaviour to toy with one's prey in the pursuit of selfish desires.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Después de un cierto umbral, la maestría del Éter se concentra. La tentación de usarlo para reformar el mundo se vuelve irresistible, sin importar los riesgos del efecto mariposa. Manipularlo a distancia y volver a moldear el hilo que conecta a cada ser con él se convierte en una llamada nefasta que finalmente conduce a un sistema moral fallido y a un comportamiento depredador para jugar con la presa en la búsqueda de deseos egoístas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Veil of Illusion","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Velo de Ilusión"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leaves a decoy behind when a teleport is activated.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deja un señuelo cuando te teletransportas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Void Paralysis","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Parálisis del Vacío"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Deals Aether damage to enemies between the beginning and end of the teleport. \\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Stasis.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Inflige Daño de Éter a los enemigos entre el principio y el final del teletransporte.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Inmovilización."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Consequence Reversal","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Consecuencia Reversa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Casting this skill removes all crowd control effects.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Al lanzar esta habilidad se eliminan todos los efectos de control de masas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"March of the Time Devourers","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Marcha de los Devoradores del Tiempo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown\\n\\nAllows skill to be cast mutiple times. Each re-cast has an increased Willpower cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga\\n\\nPermite que la habilidad sea lanzada varias veces a un coste mayor. En cada relanzamiento se incrementa el coste de Voluntad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The most powerful sorcerers of the cult of Infinity aim to mimic their Fallen overlord. They have partially severed their link to time itself, allowing them to move through the Aether motionlessly at an uncanny speed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los hechiceros más poderosos del Culto del Infinito pretenden imitar a su señor Caído. Han roto parcialmente su vínculo con el propio tiempo, permitiéndoles moverse a través del Éter a una velocidad asombrosa mientras permanecen inmóviles."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Aethereal Bounce","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rebote Etéreo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases attack speed and spell casting speed after using this skill.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de ataque y de lanzamiento de hechizos después de usar esta habilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Convolution","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convolución"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Return to original location when Aether Jump is re-cast.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Regresa a la ubicación original cuando se vuelve a lanzar el Salto Etéreo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_10_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Deconstructing time allows the possibility to create minor anomalies. To shape things in a way that should not be possible. Something even Primordials have trouble achieving is the teleportation recoil effect. The act of teleporting does not only consume energy: it condenses it in an unstable cluster, which may on implosion cause teleportation to recur a number of times, occasionally trapping the subject in an infinite loop.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El tiempo de deconstrucción permite la posibilidad de crear anomalías menores. Darle forma a las cosas de una manera que no debería ser posible. Algo que incluso los Primordiales tienen problemas para conseguir es el efecto de retroceso de la teletransportación. El acto de teletransportarse no solo consume energía: la condensa en un cúmulo inestable, que puede en caso de implosión, hacer que la teletransportación se repita varias veces, atrapando ocasionalmente al sujeto en un bucle infinito."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Interstitial Boost","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Impulso Intersticial"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases movement speed after completing a teleport.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de movimiento después de un teletransporte."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Transcendant Mind","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mente Transcendente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Willpower cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Voluntad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Quantum Stubbornness","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Testarudez TEXT":"Auspex's Due","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tributo de Auspex"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Teleport_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Gain Willpower for each enemy passed through with Aether Jump.","TRANSLATED
