aumentado por cada acumulación de dolencias que tiene un monstruo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Corruption's Bloat","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Hinchazón de la Corrupción"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage done by summoned allies when they explode.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño causado por los aliados invocados cuando explotan."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Metempsychosis","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Metempsicosis"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance for explosions to drop a health globe.\\n\\nReduces damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de que las explosiones dejen caer una esfera de vida.\\n\\nReduce el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_10_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"While the practices of the Cult of Doom are horrifying, they are not usually bombastic. The Hierarch of Infestation is an enthusiast of all protracted suffering and slow decay. He feeds and feeds and feeds the beast-Fallen Bezeriel, who exudes energies both poisonous and healing in return.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aunque las prácticas del Culto de la Perdición son horribles, no suelen ser exageradas. El Jerarca Bajo el Azote es un entusiasta de todos los sufrimientos prolongados y de una lenta decadencia. Alimenta y alimenta y alimenta a la bestia-caída Bezeriel, que emana energías venenosas y curativas a cambio."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Pauper's Last Rites","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Últimos Ritos del Indigente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Toxic damage to Fire damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el Daño Tóxico base en daño de Fuego.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_11_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"While Bezeriel has direct control over the process of decomposition, his cults have to contend with worshipping a dead god and the limits of his reach. There are more prosaic ways of weaponizing the human body. If one places a mine underneath the bodies of the dead, some dutiful comrade or bereaved relative is certain to come collecting.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mientras que Bezeriel tenía control directo sobre el proceso de descomposición, sus cultos tienen que lidiar con la adoración de un dios muerto y los límites de su alcance. Hay formas más prosaicas de armar el cuerpo humano. Si uno coloca una mina debajo de los cuerpos de los muertos, algún camarada obediente o pariente afligido seguramente vendrá a recogerla."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Loser's Gift","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Regalo del Perdedor"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cutaneous Infection","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Infección Cutánea"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Rapid Onset","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Inicio Rápido"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Short Range Contaminants","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Contaminantes de Corto Alcance"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Biohazard","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Peligro Biológico"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_CorpseExplosion_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Scorching Salvation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Salvación Abrasadora"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Area of effect increases over time.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto aumenta con el tiempo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Stellar Swiftness","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rapidez Estelar"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases movement speed for the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de movimiento para el área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Glare Of Judgement","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Resplandor del Juicio"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases tick-rate.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la frecuencia del tic."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Devastation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Devastación"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Area of effect leaves a trail that damages enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto deja un rastro que causa daño a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sunrise","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Amanecer"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Area of effect becomes static when cast. Can be re-cast to change its location.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto se vuelve estática cuando la lanzas. Puedes volverla a lanzar en otro lugar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Abanazaar caught up to Anathëa and tried to plead his case. After all, had fire not spread where her light had dried the land? Was she not able of scorching, burning, and destroying as he was? She recognized the inclination towards fire within her yet turned him away, for she regretted such destructive impulses within herself. In such things did Moros balance her, in a way that Abanazaar could not","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Abanazaar atrapó a Anathëa e intentó defender su causa. Después de todo, ¿no se había propagado el fuego donde su luz había secado la tierra? ¿No era capaz de abrasar, quemar y destruir como él? Reconoció la inclinación hacia el fuego en su interior, pero lo rechazó, porque lamentaba tales impulsos destructivos en su interior. En tales cosas Moros la equilibraba, de una manera que Abanazaar no podía."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Day of Reckoning","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Día del Juicio Final"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants a buff to all resistances for yourself and allies inside the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un beneficio a todas las resistencias para ti y tus aliados dentro del área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Punishing Brilliance","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Brillo Castigador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Damage dealt by the area of effect increases over time.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El daño infligido por el área de efecto aumenta con el tiempo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Dawn Abridged","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Amanecer Acortado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces the initial cast-time.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de lanzamiento inicial."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Weight of the Sun","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Peso del Sol"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Plasmic Eruption","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Erupción Plasmática"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Creates a nova when dealing critical damage. Effect has a cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Crea una nova cuando infliges daño crítico. El efecto tiene un tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grit and Mettle","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Arena y Metal"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Area of effect deals damage instantly when the player is hit by an enemy. Effect has a cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto inflige daño instantáneamente cuando el jugador es golpeado por un enemigo. El efecto tiene un tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_11_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"After impressing Abanazaar with the full power of the sun, Anathëa walked away from him, a beam emanating from her in all directions. As he followed, their march was reflected on the earth below: wheat rising green and plentiful before it ran dry, then catching fire in the dry winds of summer.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Después de impresionar a Abanazaar con todo el poder del sol, Anathëa se alejó de él, un rayo que emanaba de ella en todas las direcciones. Al seguirlo, su marcha se reflejó en la tierra de abajo: el trigo se elevaba verde y abundante antes de secarse y luego se incendiaba con los vientos secos del verano."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Those Who Favor Fire","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aquellos que Favorecen el Fuego"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Sacred damage to Fire damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el Daño Sagrado base en daño de Fuego.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_12_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"From the first moments of his existence, Abanazaar was enraptured with the sun and knew he had to possess it. For this purpose, he approached Anathëa as the sun was setting, when she was closest to Earth. The Primordial of Dawn rebutted his vows of love kindly, but no gentle manner could dissuade him from approaching. Refusing to be cornered, she unleashed the full power of the sun on him.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Desde los primeros momentos de su existencia, Abanazaar estaba embelesado con el sol y sabía que tenía que poseerlo. Para ello, se acercó a Anathëa cuando el sol se estaba poniendo, cuando ella estaba más cerca de la Tierra. El Primordial del Amanecer rebatió sus votos de amor amablemente, pero ninguna manera gentil pudo disuadirlo de acercarse. Al negarse a ser acorralada, ella desató todo el poder del sol sobre él."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grueling Dawn","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Amanecer Agotador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Condemnation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Condenación"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Magnified Beam","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rayo Magnificado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sin Illuminated","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Pecado Luminoso"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Solarfall_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Incandescent Smoke","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Humo Incandescente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The projectile inflicts Stun on enemies. Increases cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La bomba aturde a los enemigos. Aumenta el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Barrage","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Bombardeo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Skill drops an additional projectile.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La habilidad lanza un proyectil adicional."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Slicing Dash","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Carga Rebanadora"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_3_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"While Ezaneal had many ideas for explosive weapons, his master blacksmith Hephaäron urged him to follow more conventional alleys. Moros, Primordial of Dusk, saw Ezaneal’s frustration. Believing Ezaneal wanted to protect creation with his designs, he privately expressed his support to him. He encouraged him to build new contraptions to protect Wolcen. This was the kindest word Ezaneal had heard in all his apprenticeship, so he came back to Moros with a gift: a bomb that would smother Moros’ opponents in darkness, neutralizing them without harm.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mientras que el aprendiz Ezaneal tenía muchas ideas para armas explosivas, el maestro herrero Hephaäron le instó a seguir caminos más convencionales. Moros, Primordial del Anochecer, vio la frustración de Ezaneal. Creyendo que Ezaneal solo quería proteger la creación con sus diseños, expresó en privado su admiración al inventor. Le animó a construir nuevos artilugios para proteger Wolcen. Ezaneal había escuchado en todo su aprendizaje, así que volvió con un regalo para Moros: una bomba que asfixiaría a sus oponentes en la oscuridad, neutralizándolos sin daño alguno."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Stunning Reach","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Alcance Asombroso"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases range.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el rango."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unseen Autonomy","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Autonomía Invisible"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Breaks any crowd control effects.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rompe cualquier efecto de control de masas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shadow Cast","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lanzamiento Sombrío"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leaves a decoy that generates Threat.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deja un señuelo que genera amenaza."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Silhouetted Spectre","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Silueta Espectral"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Spawns a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by the projectile.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Engendra un aliado fantasma que golpea a un enemigo después de ser golpeado por el proyectil."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Parting Gift","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Regalo de Despedida"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Dropped projectiles become mines that explode when enemies go near them.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los proyectiles lanzados se convierten en minas que explotan cuando los enemigos se acercan a ellos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Boiling Ink","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tinta Hirviente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants Rage for each enemy hit by the projectile.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga Furia por cada enemigo que es golpeado por el proyectil."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Swaddling Smoke","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Humo Envolvente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Begins Force Shield regeneration if an enemy is hit by a projectile.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Comienza la regeneración del Escudo de Fuerza si un enemigo es golpeado por un proyectil."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_10_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Realizing that Moros had protected his master, Ezaneal lost all good will towards him. The gift he had given, he decided to twist and deform. The smoke that came from within the two shells would act as a poison wherever Moros cast it, showing him to be a cruel murderer to all of mortal men.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Al darse cuenta de que Moros había protegido a su amo, Ezaneal perdió toda la buena voluntad hacia él. El regalo que le había dado, decidió retorcerlo y deformarlo. El humo que salía de las dos cáscaras actuaría como un veneno dondequiera que Moros lo lanzase, mostrándole como un cruel asesino para todos los hombres mortales."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Primis Tenebris","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Primis Tenebris"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Bomb leaves a damaging area of effect instead of inflicting a slowing effect","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La bomba deja un área de efecto dañina en lugar de infligir un efecto ralentizante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_11_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"As Ezaneal flourished from this new encouragement, he built crueller and crueller machines. Moros feared that Ezaneal took pleasure in building the machines of war and tried to bolster him down more peaceful lanes, yet day after day, Ezaneal’s spite towards his master grew. It came to a breaking point: Ezaneal cast two moons towards Hephaäron’s workshop, aiming to supplant his master. Moros knew he must intervene. He threw the black shells to confuse the satellites’ trajectory, causing them to collide and saving Hephaäron from Ezaneal.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mientras Ezaneal prosperaba con este nuevo estímulo, construyó máquinas más y más crueles. Moros temía que Ezaneal se deleitara en construir las máquinas de guerra e intentó llevarlo por caminos más pacíficos, pero día tras día, el rencor de Ezaneal hacia su amo crecía. Llegó a un punto de inflexión: Ezaneal lanzó dos lunas hacia el taller de Hephaäron, con el objetivo de suplantar a su maestro. Moros sabía que tenía que intervenir. Lanzó los proyectiles negros para confundir la trayectoria de los satélites, haciendo que chocaran y salvando a Hephaäron de Ezaneal."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Mechanical Support","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Soporte Mecánico"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases movement speed if an enemy is hit.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de movimiento si un enemigo es golpeado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Area Control","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Control de Área"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases dash distance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la distancia de la carga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Enshrouded Distance","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Distancia Envolvente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Knocks back enemies in the opposite direction to the dash.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Derriba a los enemigos en la dirección opuesta a la carga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Toxicity Ensnared","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Toxicidad Atrapada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Toxic damage instead of Shadow damage.\\n\\nInflicts an additional stack when inflicting Poison.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño Tóxico en lugar de Daño de Sombra.\\n\\nInflige una acumulación adicional cuando se inflige Veneno."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_15_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When the friendship between Ezaneal and Moros fell apart, the Primordial of Brilliance chose to twist the gift he'd given his former confidante. The bombshells he'd given him, to evade danger with smoke without causing harm, would now be a crueller instrument. The smoke that came from within the two shells would act as a poison wherever Moros cast it, showing him to be a cruel murderer to all of mortal men.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando la amistad entre Ezaneal y Moros se desmoronó, el Primordial del Esplendor eligió alterar el regalo que le había dado su antiguo confidente. Las bombas que le había dado, para evadir el peligro con el humo sin causar daño, serían ahora un instrumento más cruel. El humo que salía de los dos proyectiles actuaría como veneno dondequiera que Moros lo arrojara, mostrándole como un cruel asesino para todos los hombres mortales."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Frenzy of the Betrayed","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Frenesí de los Traicionados"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Vault_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Judicious Trigger","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Gatillo Juicioso"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage if shot is released immediately after reaching a charge level.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño si el disparo se realiza inmediatamente después de haber alcanzado un nivel de carga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"A Promised Bullet","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Una Bala Prometida"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants an additional charge level.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un nivel de carga adicional."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inflexible Blast","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Explosión Inflexible"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Greatly increases damage, but can only fire when charged to maximum level.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta considerablemente el daño, pero solo se puede disparar cuando está cargado al nivel máximo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_3_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hephaäron’s temper was already roused by Ezaneal’s past behaviour, and his victory in the hunt was the final insult. He attempted to destroy the Bio-Optical Targeting Interface, Ezaneal just barely escaping with it. He sought the help of Etheliel, Lady of Vanity. She saw the beauty in his construction, how precise and quiet its shots were, how the bodies left behind were peaceful and hardly altered at all. She granted Ezaneal’s request and preserved the \"Deathgazer\" within her eternal ice.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El temperamento de Hephaäron ya se había despertado por el comportamiento pasado de Ezaneal y su victoria en la cacería fue el insulto final. Intentó destruir la interfaz de objetivo bio-óptico y Ezaneal apenas escapó con ella. Buscó la ayuda de Etheliel, la Dama de la Vanidad. Ella vio la belleza de su construcción, lo preciso y silencioso de sus disparos, cómo los cuerpos dejados detrás estaban en paz y apenas alterados. Ella accedió a la petición de Ezaneal y preservó el \"Miramuerte\" dentro de sus hielos eternos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reckless Gunner","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Artillero Temerario"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants Rage if fired at first charge level.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga Furia si se dispara en el primer nivel de carga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Incendiary Rounds","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Munición Incendiaria"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leaves a trail in the path of the sniper shot if shot at the smallest shape.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deja un rastro en la trayectoria del disparo si se dispara a la forma más pequeña."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Aether Piercing Ammunition","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Munición perforante de Éter"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shots inflict Stasis on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los disparos infligen Inmovilización a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ranged Superiority","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Superioridad a Distancia"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases stamina regeneration while charging shot.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la regeneración de aguante mientras se carga el disparo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Protean Aim","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mira Proteana"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The area of effect of each charge level expands outward rather than inward.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto de cada nivel de carga se expande hacia afuera en lugar de hacia adentro."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_8_lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When Ezaneal presented his Bio-Optical Targeting Interface to Hephaäron, he was furious. If Ezaneal wished to continue peacocking, so be it: they would confront his rifle to Hephaäron’s bows, using two champions of equal might from the First Men’s civilizations. The protohumans weren’t able to handle the B-OTI, and so Ezaneal tricked his master by taking the form of his own champion, taking each shot with flawless precision. Hephaäron’s champion was a mere First Man and unable to match Ezaneal even with the first bow, Krearion, on his side.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando Ezaneal presentó su Interfaz de Apunte Bio-Óptico a Hephaäron, estaba furioso. Si Ezaneal deseaba seguir llamando la atención, que así fuera: enfrentarían su rifle a los arcos de Hephaäron, usando dos campeones de igual poderío de las civilizaciones de los Primeros Hombres. Los protohumanos no fueron capaces de manejar el I-ABO, por lo que Ezaneal engañó a su maestro adoptando la forma de su propio campeón, realizando cada disparo con una precisión impecable. El campeón de Hephaäron era un simple humano e incapaz de igualar a Ezaneal incluso con el primer arco, Krearion, de su lado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Internal Detonation","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Detonación Interna"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage against enemies slowed or in Stasis.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico contra enemigos ralentizados o inmovilizados."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Slow Learner","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aprendiz Lento"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance per charge level.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico por nivel de carga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"One Simple Shot","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Un Tiro Simple"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces damage.\\n\\nIncreases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el daño.\\n\\nAumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Frostbitten Salute","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Saludo Congelado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base base Physical damage to Frost damage instead of Lightning damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en Daño de Hielo en lugar de Daño Eléctrico.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_12_lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"While Hephaäron ran from one end of Wolcen to the other to distil eruptions, cyclones, and landslides into his works, Ezaneal had all he needed inside his head. While his master was away, he toiled at the creation of a rifle with a barrel of omnistar that allowed the reception of extreme energy levels, and a maintainable trigger that would allow the user to charge its fire into a laser precise beam.  The targeting system was commanded directly through the eye using an interfacing lense.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mientras Hephaäron corría de un extremo a otro de Wolcen para provocar erupciones, ciclones y deslizamientos de tierra en sus obras, Ezaneal tenía todo lo que necesitaba dentro de su cabeza. Mientras su maestro estaba fuera, trabajó en la creación de un rifle con un barril de omnistar que permitía la recepción de niveles de energía extremos y un gatillo mantenible que permitiría al usuario cargar su fuego en un rayo láser preciso. El sistema de puntería era comandado directamente a través del ojo mediante una lente de interfaz."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Vital Point","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Punto Vital"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Disabling Shot","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Disparo Incapacitador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Fragmented Rounds","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Munición Fragmentada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Comfortable Distance","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Distancia Cómoda"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Sniper_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Rage cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Furia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Mountainous Impact","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Impacto Montañoso"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"There is an explosion in an area of effect around yourself when the hammer's is recalled.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Causa una explosión en un área de efecto a tu alrededor al llamar al martillo de vuelta."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Tectonic","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tectónico"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When recalled, the hammer creates a damaging area of effect at the point where it was recalled.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando lo llamas de vuelta, el martillo crea un área de efecto dañino alrededor del punto donde fue llamado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_2_lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Baäpheth and Hephaäron sought to measure their ability in throwing Gaavanir, examined by a jury of other Primordials. Hephaäron made a shorter yet stronger throw, the warhammer crashing into the ground, revealing a chasm full of pure water below the earth. Baäpheth made the longer but weaker throw, creating the winds that ran alongside Gaavanir. The wielders and blacksmiths of the world had an equal claim to Gaavanir.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Baäpheth y Hephaäron trataron de medir su habilidad en el lanzamiento de Gaavanir, examinado por un jurado de otros Primordiales. Hephaäron hizo un lanzamiento más corto pero más fuerte, el martillo de guerra chocó contra el suelo, revelando un abismo lleno de agua pura debajo de la tierra. Baäpheth hizo el lanzamiento más largo pero más débil, creando los vientos que corrían junto a Gaavanir. Los blandidores y herreros del mundo tenían el mismo derecho sobre Gaavanir."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ram's Ricochet","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rebote de Ariete"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hammer pulls enemies toward you along its recall trajectory.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El martillo atrae a los enemigos hacia el jugador a lo largo de su trayectoria de llamada."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_3_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When Hephaäron denied Baäpheth as Gaavanir's true wielder, the Primordial of Ambition raised a flaming sword over Gaavanir, aiming to break its handle. Hephaäron did not move, or jump to save his creation. The hammer was of Primordial make, and absorbed not only the strength of the blow but the flames of the blade.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando Hephaäron rechazó a Baäpheth como el verdadero poseedor de Gaavanir, el Primordial de la Ambición levantó una espada en llamas sobre Gaavanir, con el objetivo de romper su mango. Hephaäron no se movió, ni saltó para salvar su creación. El martillo era de fabricación primordial y absorbió no solo la fuerza del golpe sino también las llamas de la hoja."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sister Stones","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Piedras Hermanas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Launch two hammers instead of one.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lanza dos martillos en lugar de uno."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Awe Inspiring Throw","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lanzamiento Inspirador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Allies along hammer's recall trajectory receive a large boost to a random damage type. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los aliados a lo largo de la trayectoria de llamada del martillo reciben un gran impulso a un tipo de daño aleatorio. "},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Pounding Shakes","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sacudidas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage to enemies along TEXT":"Shockwave","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Onda de Choque"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Stun on enemies along hammer's recall Fury","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Furia Ardiente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical damage to Fire damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el daño Físico base en daño de Fuego.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_12_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Once, as Baäpheth returned the warhammer Gaavanir to the Armory of Creation, he noted that the weapons inside responded far better to his hand than to Hephaäron’s. By this logic, he began debating with The Maestre of Industry, forger of all the first weapons, that it was the fighter and not the smith who ought to be called the true wielder of a weapon. Hephaäron opened his palm and Gaavanir flew to it. The debate over the first warhammer began in earnest.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Una vez, cuando Baäpheth devolvió el martillo de guerra Gaavanir a la Armería de la Creación, notó que las armas de su interior respondían mucho mejor a su mano que a la de Hephaäron. Con esta lógica, comenzó a debatir con el Maestro de la Industria, forjador de todas las primeras armas, que era el luchador y no el herrero quien debía ser llamado el verdadero poseedor de un arma. Hephaäron abrió la palma de su mano y Gaavanir voló hacia ella. El debate sobre el primer martillo de guerra comenzó de verdad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Thunderous Impact","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Golpe Atronador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Narrowed Throat","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Garganta Estrecha"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chronic Suffering","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sufrimiento Crónico"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Permanent Affliction","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aflicción Permanente"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Hammer_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Ailment damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño de Dolencia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Directed Conflict","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Conflicto Dirigido"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Casts to the location of the cursor.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Se lanza en la ubicación del cursor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unrelenting Attrition","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Desgaste Implacable"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The damaging area of effect follows the target.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El área de efecto dañino sigue al objetivo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Secret Move","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Movimiento secreto"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Allows the ring to be re-cast.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Permite que el anillo se vuelva a lanzar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sustenance From Obscenity","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Sustento de la Obscenidad"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leeches health from enemies, but increases damage received.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Robas vida de los enemigos, pero aumenta el daño recibido."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reaching Claws","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Garras de Alcance"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases area of effect depending on the number of players inside it.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el área de efecto dependiendo del número de jugadores dentro de ella."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unstable Flesh","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Carne Inestable"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance that enemies will explode if they are damaged with less than 10% health.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de que los enemigos exploten si son dañados con menos del 10% de vida."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Feed on Pain","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Alimentación del Dolor"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases attack and spell speed each time an enemy dies within the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de ataque y de hechizo cada vez que un enemigo muere dentro del área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_7_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Moros’ dark power ran through Bezeriel as their grip on each other tightened. Bezeriel sensed that the energy released by his own undoing would turn the tide of the battle, and allowed Moros’ knife to slice his throat. Primordials were not meant to die, and Bezeriel warped into an expanding system of rotting flesh, the strength of this transformation reverberating through his ally Baäpheth.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El oscuro poder de Moros corrió a través de Bezeriel a medida que su control sobre los demás se fue estrechando. Bezeriel sintió que la energía liberada por su propia perdición cambiaría el curso de la batalla y permitió que el cuchillo de Moros le cortara la garganta. Los Primordiales no estaban destinados a morir y Bezeriel se transformó en un sistema en expansión de carne podrida, con la fuerza de esta transformación reverberando a través de su aliado Baäpheth."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Spontaneous Brio","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Brío Espontáneo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases resource generation while inside the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la generación de recursos mientras se está dentro del área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Maddening Pain","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Dolor Enloquecedor"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance to Frenzy enemies in the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de causar Frenesí a los enemigos en el área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Individual Attrition","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Desgaste Individual"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies while inside the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos mientras se está dentro del área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Weight of Pain","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Peso del Dolor"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces movement speed for enemies inside the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce la velocidad de movimiento para los enemigos dentro del área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Conniption","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Histeria"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When cast, inflicts your missing health as damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando se lanza, inflige la vida perdida del jugador como daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_12_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When the Primordials waged war against each other, there came a time where Baäpheth and Bezeriel stood between the Armies of Genesis on one flank, and the Primordial of Dusk on the other. The First Men feared Bezeriel’s power over mortality and unleashed all they had on him first. Baäpheth felt a surge of majesty as Bezeriel’s pain echoed through him. Standing tall, he drew his weapon.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando los Primordiales hicieron la guerra entre ellos, llegó un momento en que Baäpheth y Bezeriel se situaron entre los Ejércitos del Génesis en un flanco y del Primordial del Anochecer en el otro. Los Primeros Hombres temieron el poder de Bezeriel sobre la mortalidad y le dispararon primero. Lo golpearon con una docena de flechas. Un Primordial no podía morir tan fácilmente, pero Baäpheth sintió una oleada de majestuosidad cuando el dolor de Bezeriel resonó en él. Poniéndose en pie, sacó su arma."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unhealing","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Incurable"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage on enemies suffering from damage over time.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño en enemigos que sufren daño con el tiempo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Blood Ambrosia","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ambrosía de Sangre"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases health regeneration for yourself based on how many enemies are damaged inside the area of effect.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta tu regeneración de vida basada en los enemigos heridos dentro del área de efecto."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Suffocating Eclipse","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Eclipse Asfixiante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Rend damage to Shadow damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el Daño de Desgarro base en daño de Sombra.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Maldición."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_15_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"As Baäpheth marched towards the armies of First Men, radiating pain in his wake, Bezeriel stood alone before Moros. The Primordial of Dusk embedded a dagger into Bezeriel’s body, the two locked into a grapple as Bezeriel began pushing the aches of mortality into Moros’s veins. The suffering emanating from the encounter sent a death ripple through the First Men, causing many to fall dead.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mientras Baäpheth marchaba hacia los ejércitos de los Primeros Hombres, irradiando dolor a su paso, Bezeriel estaba solo ante Moros. El Primordial del Anochecer incrustó un puñal en el cuerpo de Bezeriel, los dos se enfrentaron en una lucha cuando Bezeriel empezó a descargar los dolores de la mortalidad en las venas de Moros. El sufrimiento que emanaba del encuentro envió una onda parasitaria a través de los Primeros Hombres, causando que muchos cayeran muertos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grip of Agony","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Abrazo de Agonía"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_RingOfPain_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases duration.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la duración."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Holy Ground","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tierra Santa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Leaves an area of effect that damages enemies upon landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deja un área de efecto que daña a los enemigos al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hope's Arrival","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Llegada de la Esperanza"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Heals self and any allies caught within its area of effect upon landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Se cura a sí mismo y a todos los aliados atrapados dentro de su área de efecto al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_2_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Anathëa showed the First Army of Alia how she commanded the dawn’s power, absorbing its rays such that the energy would be cast off during attacks, causing great damage. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Anathëa mostró al Ejército de Alia como comandaba el poder del amanecer, absorbiendo sus rayos de tal manera que la energía se desprendía durante los ataques, causando gran daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Solar Energy","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Energía Solar"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases charging speed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Velocidad de carga aumentada."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Solar Logos","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Logos Solares"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants an additional charge level.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un nivel de carga adicional."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The soldiers of Alia were bloody from battling the Urhans when Anathëa descended upon them. Her presence was a balm, animating them with a new life when they had known only horror and combat since their infancy. Her light coaxed wounds into closing, bruises into dissolving, aches into abating.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Los soldados de Alia estaban desangrándose por la batalla contra los Urhans cuando Anathëa descendió sobre ellos. Su presencia era un bálsamo, animándoles con una nueva vida cuando ellos habían conocido solo horror y combate desde su infancia. Su luz hizo que las heridas se cerraran, los moretones se disolvieran y los dolores desaparecieran."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Plasmic Discharge","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Descarga Plasmática"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Causes an explosion at starting position.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Causa una explosión en la posición inicial."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Blinding Lights","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Luces Cegadoras"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inflicts Stun on enemies upon landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Inflige Aturdimiento a los enemigos al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sudden Dehydration","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deshidratación Súbita"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inflicts Weakness and Shock on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Inflige Debilidad y Electrocución a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Proud Rider","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Jinete Orgulloso"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increase to all resistances while charging.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta todas las resistencias mientras cargas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Noble Rider","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Jinete Noble"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants a resistance for each enemy hit upon landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga una resistencia por cada enemigo golpeado al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Insuppressible Rhapsody","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Rapsodia Insoportable"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants a temporary Force Shield for each enemy hit upon landing.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga un Escudo de Fuerza temporal por cada enemigo golpeado al aterrizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sheen of Hope","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Brillo de Esperanza"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants Willpower for each enemy hit.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga voluntad por cada enemigo golpeado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Across the Cosmos","TRANSLATED TEXT":"A Través del Cosmos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Sacred damage to Aether damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Stasis.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el Daño Sagrado base en daño de Éter.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Inmovilizar."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_12_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Anathëa, Dawn Incarnate, moves through the fabric of the universe as all living things do. The difference between her and humankind is that her power is immense enough to deform the weave of aether for a brief moment. As she dived down and landed amongst her enemies with all the force of Dawn, time held its breath.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Anathëa, el Amanecer Encarnado, se mueve a través del tejido del universo como todos los seres vivos. La diferencia entre ella y la humanidad es que su poder es lo suficientemente inmenso como para deformar el tejido del éter durante un breve momento. Mientras se sumergía y aterrizaba entre sus enemigos con toda la fuerza del Amanecer, el tiempo contenía la respiración."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Adjudication","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Adjudicación"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Blinding Light","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Luz Cegadora"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de infligir Dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Looking Glass","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cristal de Aumento"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases critical chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unwanted Embrace","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Abrazo Indeseado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_HolyDive_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Strike Rebound","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Golpe de Rebote"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Skill can knock back enemies, inflicting Stun on them.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La habilidad puede hacer Derribar a los enemigos, causándoles aturdimiento."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Equalizor","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ecualizador"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Can be cast onto allies, or yourself if no ally is targeted.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Puede lanzarse sobre aliados, o sobre ti mismo si no se apunta a ningún aliado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Halted Momentum","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Momento Interrumpido"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance to inflict Stun on enemies that are attacking.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de aturdir enemigos que están atacando."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Sound Body","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuerpo Sano"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants immunity to crowd control.\\n\\nReduces shield duration.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga inmunidad al control de masas.\\n\\nReduce la duración del escudo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Simulacra","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Simulacro"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Summons a decoy that will generate Threat.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Invoca a un señuelo que generará amenaza en los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_5_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Within the Armory of Creation lives the ideal of each weapon. Each warhammer is one of an infinite number of shadows cast by Gaavanir, each spear a shadow of Ishmir. These arms are placed in the lifeless hands of armours, but those armours too cast a shadow. A pale image of them can be seem at times on old battlefields. ","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Dentro de la Armería de la Creación vive el ideal de cada arma. Cada martillo de guerra es una de las infinitas sombras que proyecta Gaavanir, cada lanza es una sombra de Ishmir. Estas armas están colocadas en las manos sin vida de las armaduras, pero esas armaduras también proyectan una sombra. Una pálida imagen de ellas puede ser vista a veces en los viejos campos de batalla."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Crushing Wall","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Muro Aplastante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inflicts a portion of your weapon damage on enemies attacking the shield.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Inflige una porción de tu daño de arma a los enemigos que ataquen el escudo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Beast Of The Battlefield","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Bestia del Campo de Batalla"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Generates more Threat on yourself, or an ally if targeted.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Genera más amenaza en uno mismo, o en un aliado si se convierte en objetivo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Flies in Bevvies","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Moscas Borrachas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces damage received from projectiles.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el daño recibido de proyectiles."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Standing Rock","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Piedra de Soporte"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage absorption.\\n\\nReduces movement speed.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la absorción de daño.\\n\\nReduce la velocidad de movimiento."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grudges Collected","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Resentimientos Recogidos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants Rage when receiving damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Generas furia cuando recibes daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Banners Held High","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Banderas en Alto"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Maximum absorption is increased by a percentage of your block chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La absorción máxima es aumentada un porcentaje de tu probabilidad de bloqueo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Perpetual Osmosis","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Osmosis Perpetua"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"When cast, Force Shield is emptied and added to maximum absorption.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cuando se lanza, el Escudo de Fuerza se vacía y se agrega a la absorción máxima."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_12_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The primary method to summon a weapon from the Armory of Creation is smithing. But for those accomplished in the arcane arts, there’s an alternative. If one calls upon the idea of the Shield Itself cast by Gleidhir, a shade of it may appear to temporarily protect the summoner, eventually dispelled by its lack of Physicality.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El método principal para invocar un arma de la Armería de la Creación es la herrería. Pero para aquellos que se han dedicado a las artes arcanas hay una alternativa. Si se invoca la idea del propio Escudo lanzado por Gleidhir, puede aparecer una sombra del mismo para proteger temporalmente al invocador, eventualmente disipado por su falta de materialidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Prideful Deflagration","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deflagración Orgullosa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\\n\\nIncreases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el Daño Físico base en Daño de Fuego.\\n\\nAumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_13_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Baäpheth bore Gleidhir as he pursued Abanazaar. He raised his shield, and slammed it repeatedly into the face of the Primordial of Fire, flames bursting from the injured entity. Part of Abanazaar’s essence was absorbed by the mighty shield; as blows landed, Gleidhir took the Primordial’s pride and manifested it into a burning aura.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Baäpheth portaba a Gleidhir mientras perseguía a Abanazaar. Levantó su escudo, y lo golpeó repetidamente contra la cara del Primordial del Fuego, con llamas saliendo de la entidad herida. Parte de la esencia de Abanazaar fue absorbida por el poderoso escudo; al recibir los golpes, Gleidhir asumió el orgullo del Primordial y lo manifestó en una aura ardiente."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Vibrations Internalized","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Vibraciones Internas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases shield absorption.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Absorción del escudo aumentada."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cold Steel","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Acero Frío"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Heralded Pavis","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Pavés Proclamado"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_Ironguard_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Rage cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Furia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Deceitful Blast","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Explosion Engañosa"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Throw shadow TEXT":"Saltos y Giros"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shadow cloud that increases dodge chance.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La bomba de humo aumenta la probabilidad de cloud area of effect, granting invisibility to allies and lowering their Threat generation.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La bomba crea un área de efecto, otorgando invisibilidad a los aliados y disminuyendo su Amenaza."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_4_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"As Moros and Anathëa lead the Army of Genesis through the crags and canyons, Abanazaar fell upon them. As his first flames rained down, Moros dressed the area in darkness so Anathëa could take their command away from the ambush.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Mientras Moros y Anathëa dirigían el Ejército del Génesis a través de los peñascos y cañones, Abanazaar cayó sobre ellos. Cuando sus primeras llamas llovieron, Moros cubrió el área en oscuridad para que Anathëa pudiera tomar el mando lejos de la emboscada."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Light's Swift Retraction","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Retracción Rápida de Luz"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases movement speed after dropping a shadow cloud.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la velocidad de movimiento después de lanzar una bomba de humo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Lapse In Focus","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lapsus en el Objetivo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shadow cloud breaks any crowd control effects.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"La bomba de humo rompe cualquier efecto de control de masas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unseen Thrills","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Emociones Invisibles"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases Shadow damage after dropping a smoke cloud.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumento del daño de Sombra después de lanzar una bomba de humo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Blind Strikes","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Golpes Ciegos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance to Frenzy enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de causar frenesí en los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_8_Lore"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shifting Along Walls","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Movimientos a Través de Paredes"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Begins Force Shield regeneration when a shadow cloud is dropped.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Comienza la regeneración del Escudo de Relajante"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Dropping a shadow cloud clears Ailments.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lanzar una bomba de humo elimina las dolencias."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Umbral Promise","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Promesa Umbral"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Dropping a shadow cloud regenerates stamina points.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lanzar una bomba de humo regenera puntos de aguante."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shrouded Assailant","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Asaltante Protegido"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Allows you to attack enemies while invisible for a short period.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Te permite atacar a los enemigos mientras eres invisible durante un corto periodo de tiempo."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_12_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Moros and Abanazaar stalked each other through the awful mix of darkness and smoke, neither daring to make a sound. Moros knew the moment he tried to land a hit on the soon-to-become Fallen of Envy, he would lose the focus necessary to stay invisible. Digging into his lifeforce, he gripped onto his cover while rushing toward Abanazaar hoping to end the fight before it even began.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Moros y Abanazaar se acechaban entre sí a través de la horrible mezcla de oscuridad y humo, sin atreverse a hacer ruido. Moros sabía que en el momento en que intentara dar un golpe al Caído de la Envidia, perdería la concentración necesaria para permanecer invisible. Buscando su fuerza vital, se aferró a su cobertura mientras corría hacia Abanazaar esperando terminar la lucha antes de que empezase."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Final Trick","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Truco Final"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases invisibility duration.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta la duración de la invisibilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reign of a Phantasm","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reinado de un Fantasma"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Move through enemies while invisible.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Muévete a través de los enemigos mientras eres invisible."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_14_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Abanazaar, slower but stronger, surrounded Moros with flames hoping to flood the area with such light that his rival would have nowhere to cling to. The Primordial of Dusk seemed at peace, and only asked Abanazaar to forgive him for having Anathëa's love . With a roar, Abanazaar projected a blast of fire onto Moros, maintained for hours. It took him that long to realize that the fire had gone right through Moros, who had flown away into the smoke cause by his rage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Abanazaar, más lento pero más fuerte, rodeó a Moros con llamas con la esperanza de inundar la zona con tal luz que su rival no tuviera a dónde aferrarse. El Primordial del Anochecer parecía en paz y solo pidió a Abanazaar que le perdonara por tener el amor de Anathëa . Con un rugido, Abanazaar proyectó una ráfaga de fuego sobre Moros, que se mantuvo durante horas. Tardó ese tiempo en darse cuenta de que el fuego había atravesado a Moros, que había desaparecido en el humo causado por su furia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Crepuscular Attunement","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Afinación Crepuscular"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_16","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Ex Nihilo","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ex Nihilo"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_SmokeBomb_variant_16_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Rage cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Furia."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_1","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Unseelie Gale","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Vendaval Invisíble"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_1_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Inflicts Stun on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Inflige Aturdimiento a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_2","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Entwining Volutes","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Volutas Entrelazadas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_2_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Eclipse now has a 360 degrees area of effect around yourself.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Eclipse tiene ahora un área de efecto de 360 grados a tu alrededor."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_2_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Though Moros urged Anathëa to run, she remained at his side. As he turned the arrows of the Primordial traitors' Army back against them, she charged those weapons with a smiting glow, and as they lay dying all the sins they had committed were carried to the light and laid bare.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aunque Moros instó a Anathëa a escapar, ella permaneció a su lado. Mientras él volteaba las flechas del Ejército Primordial traidor contra ellos, ella cargó esas armas con un brillo abrasador y mientras morían, todos los pecados que habían cometido fueron llevados a la luz y expuestos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_3","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Dayless Coasts","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Costas Sin Día"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_3_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces cooldown.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el tiempo de recarga."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_4","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shell of Nothing","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Caparazón de Nada"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_4_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases damage.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el daño."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_5","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Far Side Of The Moon","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Lado Oscuro de la Luna"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_5_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases range.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Aumenta el rango."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_6","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Shambling Eyeless","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Tambalearse sin Ojos"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_6_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Slows enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Ralentiza Enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_7","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Rushing For Curfew","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Apurando el Toque de Queda"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_7_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants Willpower for each enemy hit.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga voluntad por cada enemigo golpeado."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_8","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Jet Tidal Wave","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Maremoto"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_8_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reflects projectiles instead of destroying them.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Refleja los proyectiles en lugar de destruirlos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_8_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The enemy dared at first not to shoot, certain that some trickery of the Primordial of Dusk would do them in. The Army of Genesis was unprepared for battle, and requested their freedom in exchange for the darkness being lifted. Their enemies feigned acceptance, but shot their bows towards the Army of Genesis while they exited a bottleneck exit at the end of the canyon. Moros breathed another wave of shadow: before they knew to stop, their arrows had pierced their own throats.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"El enemigo se atrevió al principio a no disparar, seguro de que algún truco del Primordial del Anochecer los haría entrar. El Ejército del Génesis no estaba preparado para la batalla y pidió su libertad a cambio de que se disipara la oscuridad. Sus enemigos fingieron aceptar pero dispararon sus arcos contra el Ejército del Génesis mientras salían de un cuello de botella al final del cañón. Moros respiró otra ola de sombra: antes de que supieran que debían detenerse, sus flechas habían atravesado sus propias gargantas."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_9","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Bursting of Desert Rocks","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Estallido de Rocas del Desierto"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_9_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Health globes caught within the blast will explode.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Las esferas de vida atrapadas en la explosión explotarán."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_10","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Seasonal Tarnish","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Deslucimiento Estacional"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_10_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad aumentada de infligir dolencias a los enemigos."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_11","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Cover of Darkness","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Cubierta de Oscuridad"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_11_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Grants Force Shield per the number of enemies hit by the blast.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Otorga Escudo de Fuerza por el número de enemigos golpeados por la explosión."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_12","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Rationality's Extinguishing","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Extinción de la Razón"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_12_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Chance to Frenzy enemies hit by the blast.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Probabilidad de causar frenesí en los enemigos golpeados por la explosión."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_13","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Trespasses Revealed","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Infracciones Reveladas"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_13_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Converts base Shadow Damage to Sacred Damage.\\n\\nIncreases chance of inflicting Weakness.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convierte el Daño de Sombra base en daño Sagrado.\\n\\nAumenta la probabilidad de infligir Debilidad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_13_Lore","ORIGINAL TEXT":"The forces of Genesis were trapped in a canyon that hugged the Red Mountain, the forces of Ashtaroth converging on them. Moros pushed the surrounding army back with a guff of black ink, warning the enemy not to advance further if they valued their lives. But as more and more forces appeared, overlooking the nearby cliffs, he could only plunge more and more of the landscape into darkness.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Las fuerzas del Génesis estaban atrapadas en un cañón que abrazaba la Montaña Roja, las fuerzas de Astaroth convergían sobre ellos. Moros hizo retroceder al ejército circundante con una ráfaga de tinta negra, advirtiendo al enemigo de que no avanzara más si valoraban sus vidas. Pero a medida que aparecían más y más fuerzas, vigilando los acantilados cercanos, solo podía hundir más y más el paisaje en la oscuridad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_14","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Hopeless Conviction","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Convicción sin Esperanza"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_14_desc","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Reduces Willpower cost.","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Reduce el coste de Voluntad."},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_15","ORIGINAL TEXT":"Blots of Terror","TRANSLATED TEXT":"Manchas de Terror"},{"KEY":"ui_Variant_AetherBlast_variant_15_desc","ORIGINAL
